original: @124b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @124b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni mandala no pi ka kri ba aa ba li n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni mandala no pi ka kri ba aa ba li n'a ma /
translated: Śrī-sarva-durgati-pariśodhani-maṇḍala-vidhi-avalī-nāma

original: bod skad du //
analyzed: bod skad du //
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thugs rje phreng ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thugs rje phreng ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The glorious Tantra of the Ritual of the Mandala of the Purification of All Evil Destinies, called the Garland of Compassion

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened Buddha, the King who Purifies All Evil Destinies.

original: dpal gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kun gyi sku //
analyzed: dpal gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kun gyi sku //
translated: The source of glory, the body of all the Buddhas,

original: nyon mongs mtha' dag kun bcom nas //
analyzed: nyon mongs mtha' dag kun bcom nas //
translated: having completely destroyed all the afflictions,

original: 'gro la thugs rjes spyan gyis rab gzigs la //
analyzed: 'gro la thugs rjes spyan gyis rab gzigs la //
translated: with eyes of compassion for beings,

original: kun nas dang ba'i sgo nas phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: kun nas dang ba'i sgo nas phyag 'tshal te /
translated: I pay homage with a completely pure mind.🔽The supreme garland of compassion, the ritual of the mandala

original: skye ba brgyud pa'i sdug bsngal gcod byed pa'i //🔽thugs rje phreng mchog dkyil @125a * //
analyzed: skye ba brgyud pa'i sdug bsngal gcod byed pa'i // thugs rje phreng mchog dkyil @125a * //
translated: that cuts through the suffering of the lineage of births,

original: 'khor cho ga bshad //
analyzed: 'khor cho ga bshad //
translated: I shall explain.

original: de la bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnal 'byor pa snod du gyur pa rnams kyi dam tshig thams cad bsdu bar gyur pas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnal 'byor pa snod du gyur pa rnams kyi dam tshig thams cad bsdu bar gyur pas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: In that [tantra], the Bhagavān, the great king of tantras of the purification of all evil destinies, has gathered all the samayas of the yogins and yoginīs into the concise mandala ritual.

original: de la dang po rnal 'byor pa sems dad pas mchog tu gyur pa dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba bsgrub par 'dod pas //
analyzed: de la dang po rnal 'byor pa sems dad pas mchog tu gyur pa dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba bsgrub par 'dod pas //
translated: There, first, a yogin or yoginī who has supreme faith in the mind, wishing to accomplish the glorious purification of all evil destinies,

original: stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
analyzed: stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
translated: should sit on a comfortable seat.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don du sems bskyed la /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du sems bskyed la /
translated: Having generated the mind for the sake of all sentient beings,

original: dri la sogs pas khrus byas pas /
analyzed: dri la sogs pas khrus byas pas /
translated: having bathed with scents and so forth,

original: chos thams cad bdag med par lhag par mos par bya'o //🔽de nas mgrin pa'i phyogs su pam las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
analyzed: chos thams cad bdag med par lhag par mos par bya'o // de nas mgrin pa'i phyogs su pam las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
translated: one should imagine all phenomena to be selfless.🔽Then, in the throat area, one should imagine an eight-petaled red lotus from paṃ,

original: de'i lce'i padma'i 'dab ma la aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i lce'i padma'i 'dab ma la aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: and on the tongue lotus, a moon maṇḍala from a.

original: de'i steng du h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams nas //🔽aom badzra dzi hva /
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams nas // aom badzra dzi hva /
translated: On top of that, one should imagine a white five-pronged vajra arisen from hūṃ.

original: zhes brjod do //
analyzed: zhes brjod do //
translated: One should recite oṃ vajra jñāna.

original: yang dag pa gnyis la aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po rer gyur par bsams la /🔽aom badzra ha sta /
analyzed: yang dag pa gnyis la aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po rer gyur par bsams la / aom badzra ha sta /
translated: Again, on the two realities, one should imagine a moon maṇḍala arisen from aṃ, and on top of that, a white five-pronged vajra arisen from hūṃ.

original: zhes brjod do //
analyzed: zhes brjod do //
translated: One should recite oṃ vajra hastha.

original: de'i rjes la rkang pa'i mthil gnyis su aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
analyzed: de'i rjes la rkang pa'i mthil gnyis su aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
translated: After that, one should imagine a moon maṇḍala arisen from aṃ on the soles of the feet.

original: de'i steng du h'um las gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te /🔽de nas aom sarba yo ga badzr'a ya h'um /
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um las gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te / de nas aom sarba yo ga badzr'a ya h'um /
translated: On top of that, one should imagine a variegated vajra arisen from hūṃ.

original: zhes pas yan lag thams cad rdo rjer gyur par bsam /
analyzed: zhes pas yan lag thams cad rdo rjer gyur par bsam /
translated: Then, with oṃ sarva yoga vajra āḥ, one should imagine that all the limbs become vajras.

original: de nas bgegs gzhil bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas bgegs gzhil bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar 'gyur te /
translated: After that, in order to dispel obstructors, one should bind all the mudras.

original: de la h'um las sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje nyi ma ru bdag nyid sprul la /
analyzed: de la h'um las sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje nyi ma ru bdag nyid sprul la /
translated: For that, one should emanate oneself as the wrathful Vajrasūrya arisen from hūṃ.

original: rdo rje me'i nyi ma rab tu bsams nas /
analyzed: rdo rje me'i nyi ma rab tu bsams nas /
translated: Having imagined the sun of vajra fire,

original: khros pa'i sems kyis khro bo ti r'in ti ri'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: khros pa'i sems kyis khro bo ti r'in ti ri'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
translated: One should bind the mudra of Krodha Tīrṇakrodha with an angry mind.

original: de la rdo rje mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ba ni /
analyzed: de la rdo rje mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ba ni /
translated: There, the two thumbs are extended in the vajra.

original: ti r'in ti ri'i phyag rgya ste /🔽grihna badzra sa ma ya h'um /
analyzed: ti r'in ti ri'i phyag rgya ste / grihna badzra sa ma ya h'um /
translated: This is the mudra of Tīrṇakrodha.🔽One should recite:

original: zhes brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes brjod par bya zhing /
translated: “Graha vajra samaya hūṃ.”

original: sa 'og bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: sa 'og bcing bar bya'o //
translated: One should bind below the earth.

original: de nas rdo rje'i gdan phyed du 'dug la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i gdan phyed du 'dug la /
translated: Then, sitting in half vajra posture,

original: dang po'i phyag rgya de nyid du bcing ste /
analyzed: dang po'i phyag rgya de nyid du bcing ste /
translated: one should bind that very first mudrā.

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar byas la /
translated: Having conferred the consecration of the vajra garland,

original: dar dpyangs kyis brgyan par bya zhing /🔽aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um aa bhi shinyts'a mam /
analyzed: dar dpyangs kyis brgyan par bya zhing / aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um aa bhi shinyts'a mam /
translated: one should adorn it with a hanging silk.

original: zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should recite:🔽“Oṃ vajra jvala ānāla arka hūṃ abhiṣiñcāma.”

original: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis mdud cing /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis mdud cing /
translated: Then, having formed the two vajra fists, one should tie the two index fingers together,

original: snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / ltag pa dang / yang snying ga la sogs par mdud pa las sna tshogs go @125b bgo bar byas la /
analyzed: snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / ltag pa dang / yang snying ga la sogs par mdud pa las sna tshogs go @125b bgo bar byas la /
translated: and having tied at the heart, forehead, back of the neck, and again at the heart, one should don the various armors.

original: g-yon pa dkur 'dzin par byas la /🔽g-yas rdo rje gsor bas bgegs ma lus pa gzhom par bya ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa dkur 'dzin par byas la / g-yas rdo rje gsor bas bgegs ma lus pa gzhom par bya ste /
translated: The left hand is placed on the hip.

original: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um sarba bighn'an phat /
analyzed: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um sarba bighn'an phat /
translated: With the right hand one should brandish the vajra and destroy all obstructors.

original: ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should recite:🔽oṃ vajra jvalānāla arka hūṃ sarva vighnān phaṭ

original: de nas khro bo de nyid kyi phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo rnams nang du 'bar bar bya zhing mthe bong de bzhin du bsgreng bas /
analyzed: de nas khro bo de nyid kyi phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo rnams nang du 'bar bar bya zhing mthe bong de bzhin du bsgreng bas /
translated: Then, with the same mudra of wrath, one should bind the vajra fist and, with the fingers blazing inside, one should raise the thumbs in the same way.🔽One should recite:

original: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat /
translated: oṃ vajra jvalānāla hana daha pacha māta bhaya caraṇa hūṃ phaṭ

original: ces pas bgegs kyi chogs ma lus par bsreg par bya'o //
analyzed: ces pas bgegs kyi chogs ma lus par bsreg par bya'o //
translated: One should burn all the hosts of obstructors without exception.

original: de'i rjes la rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste /
translated: After that, one should bind the vajra fist and raise both thumbs.🔽One should recite:

original: aom badzra ne tre sarba bighn'am bandha /
analyzed: aom badzra ne tre sarba bighn'am bandha /
translated: oṃ vajra netra sarva vighnān bandha

original: zhes bya bas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
translated: One should bind all obstructors with that.

original: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas mthe bong dang mthe chung so sor rtse mo sprad de /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas mthe bong dang mthe chung so sor rtse mo sprad de /
translated: Then, having bound the vajra binding, the thumbs and little fingers are crossed.

original: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksham sarba sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksham sarba sv'a h'a /
translated: Om vajra dridho me bhava rakṣa sarva sādhu svāhā.

original: zhes brjod pas sa 'og bcing bar bya'o //🔽rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa las g-yas pa sdigs mdzub tu bya zhing /
analyzed: zhes brjod pas sa 'og bcing bar bya'o // rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa las g-yas pa sdigs mdzub tu bya zhing /
translated: Having recited this, the lower direction is bound.🔽From the binding of the vajra fist, the right [hand] is made into a threatening [forefinger],

original: g-yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul du byas la /
analyzed: g-yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul du byas la /
translated: and the left is made into the form of a hook.

original: khros pa'i yid kyis khro bo de nyid nam mkha'i phyogs su spros pa las /
analyzed: khros pa'i yid kyis khro bo de nyid nam mkha'i phyogs su spros pa las /
translated: With a mind of wrath, that wrathful one emanates into the space direction.

original: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
analyzed: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
translated: Om hulu hulu hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces pas steng phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: ces pas steng phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Having recited this, the upper direction is bound.

original: mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel te rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje rtse sprad par byas la spyi bor btsugs nas /
analyzed: mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel te rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje rtse sprad par byas la spyi bor btsugs nas /
translated: The little fingers are bound in a chain, and the two forefingers of the two vajra fists are joined at the tips of the vajras, and having been placed on the crown,

original: aom drum bandha /
analyzed: aom drum bandha /
translated: om drum bandha.

original: zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: zhes brjod pas /
translated: Having recited this,

original: shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
translated: the eastern direction is bound.

original: rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las mkhrig ma gnyis mdud de lho phyogs su bltas te /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las mkhrig ma gnyis mdud de lho phyogs su bltas te /
translated: From the binding of the vajra fist, the two wrists are bound and one looks to the south.

original: aom badzra pra sha hri phat /
analyzed: aom badzra pra sha hri phat /
translated: Oṃ vajra praśa hrīḥ phaṭ.

original: ces pas lho phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: ces pas lho phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
translated: With this, bind the southern direction.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings pa las gung mo gnyis rtse sprad de /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings pa las gung mo gnyis rtse sprad de /
translated: From the binding of the vajra-binding, the two middle fingers touch at the tips,

original: srin lag gnyis tshigs bar ma bsnol nas mthe chung gnyis brkyang bar byas te /
analyzed: srin lag gnyis tshigs bar ma bsnol nas mthe chung gnyis brkyang bar byas te /
translated: the two ring fingers cross at the second joint, and the two little fingers are extended.

original: aom pa tadgi  pa tadgi  ni ra trat /
analyzed: aom pa tadgi  pa tadgi  ni ra trat /
translated: Oṃ paṭa diga paṭa diga ni ra taṭ.

original: ces pas nub phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: ces pas nub phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
translated: With this, bind the western direction.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba'i tshul du bya /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba'i tshul du bya /
translated: From the binding of the vajra-binding, the two index fingers are made into fangs,

original: mthe bong gnyis kha'i tshul du byas nas /
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis kha'i tshul du byas nas /
translated: and the two thumbs are made into a mouth.

original: aom badzra yaksha h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra yaksha h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra yakṣa hūṃ.

original: zhes brjod pas byang phyogs bcing bar bya'o //🔽de nas rdo rje sna tshogs kyi bdag nyid las lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad la mthe bong dang mthe chung so sor bsnol /
analyzed: zhes brjod pas byang phyogs bcing bar bya'o // de nas rdo rje sna tshogs kyi bdag nyid las lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad la mthe bong dang mthe chung so sor bsnol /
translated: With this, bind the northern direction.🔽Then, from the identity of the various vajras, the two hands are placed back to back, the thumbs and the two little fingers crossed,

original: sor mo lhag ma drag pa so sor rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul las sa la bstan pas sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par bya zhing /
analyzed: sor mo lhag ma drag pa so sor rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul las sa la bstan pas sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par bya zhing /
translated: and the remaining fingers are extended in the form of three-tined vajras.
Oṃ🔽

original: badzra tha tha tha tha /🔽zhes brjod bar bya'o //
analyzed: badzra tha tha tha tha / zhes brjod bar bya'o //
translated: vajra-tathatā-tathatā-tathatā!

original: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya mthe chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du byas la sdigs mdzub gnyis bsgreng la phyogs bzhir bskyad pas ra dang po dang / de nyid las sdigs mdzub bzhi pas ra ba gnyis pa bya zhing /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya mthe chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du byas la sdigs mdzub gnyis bsgreng la phyogs bzhir bskyad pas ra dang po dang / de nyid las sdigs mdzub bzhi pas ra ba gnyis pa bya zhing /
translated: Then, with the gesture of Vajra Humkara, interlock the two little fingers like a chain, raise the two threatening forefingers, and extend them in the four directions.

original: aom badzra pra ka ra h'um badzra h'um ka ra h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra pra ka ra h'um badzra h'um ka ra h'um /
translated: With the same gesture, make a second fence with the four threatening forefingers, and say: Oṃ vajra prakara hūṃ vajra hūṃkāra hūṃ.

original: zhes pas rdo rje ra ba bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas rdo rje ra ba bya'o //
translated: With this, make the vajra fence.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa rgyas par brkyang ba'i steng du bkab la bskyod de /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa rgyas par brkyang ba'i steng du bkab la bskyod de /
translated: Cover the extended vajra binding with the two hands, and shake it.

original: aom panydza ra na h'um /
analyzed: aom panydza ra na h'um /
translated: With the words, Oṃ pañjara na hūṃ,

original: zhes brjod pas rdo rje'i gur du bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: zhes brjod pas rdo rje'i gur du bya ba nyid do //
translated: make the vajra tent.

original: de'i rjes la me tog gi phyag rgya'am rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
analyzed: de'i rjes la me tog gi phyag rgya'am rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
translated: After that, consecrate the bali with the flower gesture or the Vajrayakṣa gesture.

original: rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las mdzub mo dang mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel te /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las mdzub mo dang mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel te /
translated: Make a fist with the vajra and interlock the forefinger and little finger like a chain.

original: aom sarba bid badzra tsakra h'um /
analyzed: aom sarba bid badzra tsakra h'um /
translated: Om sarva vid vajra cakra hum.

original: zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun brjod pas phyogs kun du bskor bas dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun brjod pas phyogs kun du bskor bas dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par bya'o //
translated: By reciting this mantra seven times and circumambulating, one should emanate the glorious mandala of the purification of all evil destinies.

original: de nyid snying ga'am khar bzhag la sngags de nyid lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyid snying ga'am khar bzhag la sngags de nyid lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Placing it on one's heart or mouth, by reciting that mantra one hundred and eight times, one will accomplish all mandalas.

original: de yis dkyil 'khor mngon sum dang 'dra bar bltas la /
analyzed: de yis dkyil 'khor mngon sum dang 'dra bar bltas la /
translated: By that, one should see the mandala as if it were directly present.

original: padma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa dri dang / kha dog sna tshogs pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gyur pa'i steng du phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / khro bo la sogs pa thams cad de nyid du sprul la /
analyzed: padma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa dri dang / kha dog sna tshogs pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gyur pa'i steng du phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / khro bo la sogs pa thams cad de nyid du sprul la /
translated: On an eight-petaled lotus with various colors and scents, filling the entire realm of space, one should emanate all the bodhisattvas of the ten directions, the noble arhats, pratyekabuddhas, wrathful ones, and so forth.

original: kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas /
analyzed: kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas /
translated: Alas, the Buddha's Buddha!

original: kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs //
analyzed: kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs //
translated: Ah! The excellent deeds of the Buddha!

original: gang phyir ngan song thams cad kyi //
analyzed: gang phyir ngan song thams cad kyi //
translated: Since all the lower realms🔽are purified,

original: rgyud ni dag par byin gyis rlobs //
analyzed: rgyud ni dag par byin gyis rlobs //
translated: grant your blessings!

original: zhes pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //

analyzed: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin // byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //

analyzed: phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum // dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung //

original: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
analyzed: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
translated: In the great, supreme family of action,🔽I will perfectly uphold

analyzed: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni // yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //

original: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
analyzed: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
translated: Having generated the sublime,

analyzed: byang chub sems ni bla med pa // dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas //

original: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //

analyzed: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung // ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi //
translated: I will uphold all the vows without exception.🔽I will liberate those who are not liberated.

original: ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
analyzed: ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
translated: I will liberate those who are not liberated.

original: dbugs ma phyin pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: dbugs ma phyin pa'i sems can rnams //

analyzed: dbyugs dbyung mya ngan 'das la dgod //

original: de ltar sdom pa bzung nas /
analyzed: de ltar sdom pa bzung nas /

original: bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste /

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / padma dang / las kyi ris su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la bdag nyid dbul gyis /

translated: I offer myself to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas of the ten directions, to all those abiding in the vajra, jewel, lotus, and action families, to all the deities of the maṇḍala of mudrā, mantra, and vidyā.

original: bdag dus thams cad nas rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol lo //🔽zhes brjod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du /
analyzed: bdag dus thams cad nas rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol lo // zhes brjod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du /

analyzed: lus rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa spros pas so so'i zhabs drung du dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Recite this and emanate immeasurable bodies into all the buddhafields, offering them to each of the buddhas.🔽Then recite:

analyzed: de nas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis /

analyzed: dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol lo zhes brjod la /

analyzed: dge ba de yang sems can thams cad dang / thun mong du bsngo ste /

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis /

analyzed: bdag dang sems can thams cad / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i /

original: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal la /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal la /

translated: one should generate the supreme mind of enlightenment, which is the mind that focuses on the great mind, the unsurpassed mind that wishes to liberate them from that, and the mind that is supreme in being the mind of complete liberation through the ārya dharmas, and the mind that is ultimate in being the mind that is free of reference points with regard to all things.

original: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba tsam dngos po kun gyi mchog tu gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba tsam dngos po kun gyi mchog tu gyur par bsgom par bya'o //

original: de'i rjes la sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya ste /🔽aom na mo bha ga ba ti tsitta sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga t'a y'arha te /

analyzed: samyaksam buddh'a ya /

original: tadya th'a / aom sho dha ya sho dha ya /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom sho dha ya sho dha ya /

original: shuddhe bi shuddhe /
analyzed: shuddhe bi shuddhe /

analyzed: sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a / zhes bzlas pas /

analyzed: lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag la /

analyzed: mthe bong gnyis la a'a zhes bya ba bsam /

original: de ltar de dag yongs su gyur ba las /
analyzed: de ltar de dag yongs su gyur ba las /
translated: In that way, they are completely transformed into

analyzed: rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so //

analyzed: ha ha ha ha ho: badzra mushti /

analyzed: lag pa gyen du 'phangs la /

analyzed: aom badzra p'a ni spho ta ya sarba aa p'a ya bandha ni pra mo ksha na sarba aa p'a ya ga te bhya: sarba tr'a sa nan sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya trat /
translated: Oṃ vajra-hand! Release all the bonds of evil, and liberate all the destinies of evil, all the fetters, all the tathāgatas! Vajra-pledge! Tret!

original: ces brjod la gung mo gnyis mnyam par sbyar la /
analyzed: ces brjod la gung mo gnyis mnyam par sbyar la /

analyzed: gzhan ma bzhi po rtse mo sprad de sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o //
translated: and the other four tips are joined together, and all evil is released.

analyzed: de nas chos thams cad rab tu bsdu ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /

analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan bdun brjod de /

original: aom sarba mu: zhes pas dgrol bar bya'o //🔽de nyid kyis ni dngos grub thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su 'og min gyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnas pa dang
analyzed: aom sarba mu: zhes pas dgrol bar bya'o // de nyid kyis ni dngos grub thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su 'og min gyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnas pa dang
translated: one should release it with “Oṃ sarva muḥ.”

original: 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: By that very [mantra], one becomes like the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Sarvārthasiddha, whose nature is the perfection of the accumulations of merit and wisdom for the complete accomplishment of all powers, abiding in the Akaniṣṭha kūṭāgāra palace.

original: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su /

analyzed: rang gi lha'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su /
translated: in the center of the vajra located in the heart of one's deity,

original: rang gi lha'i snying po dam tshig gis bris la /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i snying po dam tshig gis bris la /
translated: one should write the essence mantra of one's deity with commitment.

analyzed: de nyid la mngon par phyogs pa'i lte ba'i dbus su dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa /
translated: In the very center of that, facing it, is the sixteen vowels,

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa dang / yang de'i steng du yi ge ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa dang / yang de'i steng du yi ge ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su gyur pa las /

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa nyid du bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa nyid du bsam par bya'o //
translated: You should imagine a second moon mandala.

original: de dag gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du /
analyzed: de dag gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du /
translated: Upon those two,

analyzed: badzra zhes bya ba'i snying po dang / de las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs dang bcas par bsam par bya'o //
translated: you should imagine the essence “vajra” and from that a five-pronged vajra together with a mass of light rays.

original: ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa rnams kyi ni rang rang gi snying po las byung ba'i mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa rnams kyi ni rang rang gi snying po las byung ba'i mtshan ma ste /
translated: For the purification of the lower realms and so forth, the sign arises from their respective essences.

original: de dag @129b gi dbus su snying po rnams bkod la rang rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya ba ni /🔽badzro& ham / zhes pa nas ghanto& ham /
analyzed: de dag @129b gi dbus su snying po rnams bkod la rang rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya ba ni / badzro& ham / zhes pa nas ghanto& ham /
translated: You should arrange the essences in the middle of those and meditate on the pride of each of the seals.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar du /
translated: “Vajraṃ aham” up to “ghaṇṭaṃ aham.”

original: rang rang gi snying po yang bzlas shing de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas par bzhugs pa rnams /
analyzed: rang rang gi snying po yang bzlas shing de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas par bzhugs pa rnams /

original: rang rang gi phyag rgya la bzhugs par bsams te /
analyzed: rang rang gi phyag rgya la bzhugs par bsams te /
translated: Think that they reside in their individual seals.

original: badzra tsakra sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha na h'um /
analyzed: badzra tsakra sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha na h'um /
translated: Recite vajra-cakra sarva-duḥkha-tāri-śodhana hūṃ.

original: zhes pa zlos shing phyag rgya'i gzugs de rnams /
analyzed: zhes pa zlos shing phyag rgya'i gzugs de rnams /

original: de nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skad cig ma la dus 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skad cig ma la dus 'byor pa ste /
translated: From that very moment, the time is suitable,

original: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu bsam mo //
analyzed: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu bsam mo //
translated: and one should imagine a blue wind mandala in the shape of a bow arising from yaṃ.

original: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa'o //
translated: Upon that, a red fire mandala in the shape of a triangle arises from raṃ.

original: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po'o //
translated: Upon that, from baṃ, is a white, round water maṇḍala.

original: de'i steng na lam las gser gyi sa gzhi ser bo gru bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng na lam las gser gyi sa gzhi ser bo gru bzhi pa'o //
translated: Upon that, from laṃ, is a square, yellow gold ground.

original: de'i steng du sum las ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi dang / rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa dpag tshad dang rgyar yangs par bsams la /
analyzed: de'i steng du sum las ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi dang / rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa dpag tshad dang rgyar yangs par bsams la /
translated: Upon that, from suṃ, is the king of mountains, Sumeru, which is square and beautified with eight peaks, one yojana wide and deep.

original: de'i steng du bhr'um dkar bo gyur pa las yang dag par byung ba'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen bo'i khang brtsegs bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i steng du bhr'um dkar bo gyur pa las yang dag par byung ba'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen bo'i khang brtsegs bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Upon that, from a white bhrūṃ, is the palace of the great maṇḍala of the purification of all evil destinies, which arises from the essence of Śrī Vairocana.

original: gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang ldan pa ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa rta babs bzhi dang dril bu dang / drab la sogs pas yongs su brgyan cing /
analyzed: gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang ldan pa ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa rta babs bzhi dang dril bu dang / drab la sogs pas yongs su brgyan cing /
translated: It is square with four gates, beautified with eight pillars, and has four porticos, and is completely ornamented with tinkling ornaments, and so on.

original: me tog phreng ba dang / ba dan la sogs pas spras pa rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: me tog phreng ba dang / ba dan la sogs pas spras pa rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: It is adorned with flower garlands, banners, and so forth, and is made of precious substances.

original: de'i dbus su tsam ser po las gyur pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa rin po che dang / rdo rjes rnam par spras pa'i 'od sna tshogs dang ldan par bsams te /🔽de'i dbus su aa sim aam las seng ge'i khri bskyed pa dang ; de bzhin du ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i gnas su /🔽h'um gham h'um las glang po che'i khri dang / rin chen tog gi gnas su tr'am aa tr'am las rta'i khri dang / sh'akya thub pa'i gnas su /🔽ham mam ham las /
analyzed: de'i dbus su tsam ser po las gyur pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa rin po che dang / rdo rjes rnam par spras pa'i 'od sna tshogs dang ldan par bsams te / de'i dbus su aa sim aam las seng ge'i khri bskyed pa dang ; de bzhin du ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i gnas su / h'um gham h'um las glang po che'i khri dang / rin chen tog gi gnas su tr'am aa tr'am las rta'i khri dang / sh'akya thub pa'i gnas su / ham mam ham las /
translated: In its center, imagine a wheel arisen from a yellow cam, with sixteen spokes, adorned with jewels and vajras, and endowed with various lights.🔽In its center, generate a lion throne arisen from a blue kam and a lion.

original: rma bya'i khri dang / me tog rgyas pa'i gnas su aa gam aa las nam mkha' lding gi khri bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rma bya'i khri dang / me tog rgyas pa'i gnas su aa gam aa las nam mkha' lding gi khri bsam par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, in the place of purifying all lower rebirths, a throne of elephants arisen from a blue gam and an elephant; in the place of Ratnaketu, a throne of horses arisen from a red tam and a horse; in the place of Shakyamuni, a throne of peacocks arisen from a green kham and a peacock; and in the place of Blooming Flowers, a throne of garudas arisen from a yellow gam and a garuda.

original: de'i dbus seng ge'i khri'i steng du skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
analyzed: de'i dbus seng ge'i khri'i steng du skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
translated: In the center of that, on a lion throne, sit with crossed legs.

original: bsod nams ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed la /
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed la /
translated: Having generated oneself in the form of the great bodhisattva, the hero who has accomplished all aims, who has completely perfected all the accumulations of merit and wisdom,

original: mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du byed pa mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs pa de nyid 'di ltar bsam par bya ste /🔽de nyid thugs rje chen po las byung ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de nyid 'di lta bu @133a * //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du byed pa mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs pa de nyid 'di ltar bsam par bya ste / de nyid thugs rje chen po las byung ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de nyid 'di lta bu @133a * //
translated: one should contemplate in this way, having entered into the meditative stabilization of the immovable, which is the direct realization of manifest enlightenment.

original: yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas /
analyzed: yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas /
translated: By the power of that very great compassion, the realms of all the tathāgatas become filled with bodhisattvas, like a filled pod of sesame seeds, and in order to demonstrate that perfect complete enlightenment is just like this, all the tathāgatas gather together.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying po na bzhugs pa ga na ba der gshegs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying po na bzhugs pa ga na ba der gshegs te /
translated: He went to the place where the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarvārthasiddha was sitting at the site of awakening.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin nyid kyi ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin nyid kyi ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas /
translated: The tathāgatas, for the sake of suchness, manifested the sambhogakāya.

original: 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: They said this:

original: rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam /
translated: “Son of noble family, since it is difficult to realize the thatness of all tathāgatas, you should generate enthusiasm for all practices and think, ‘How can I fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment?’”

original: de nas tishtha badzra zhes pa'i sngags kyis se gol brdabs pas slong bar mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas tishtha badzra zhes pa'i sngags kyis se gol brdabs pas slong bar mdzad do //
translated: Then, with the mantra “Tiṣṭha vajra,” he snapped his fingers and awakened him.

original: de nas sad par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la /
analyzed: de nas sad par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la /
translated: When he awoke, he said to all the tathāgatas:🔽“Bhagavān, I have seen the sambhogakāya of all tathāgatas.”

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'ak tsitta pra na men badzra bandha nam ka ro mi /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'ak tsitta pra na men badzra bandha nam ka ro mi /
translated: Oṃ, homage to the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas, vajra-bond, I pay homage.🔽

original: zhes pas phyag rgya ste 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: zhes pas phyag rgya ste 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata kāya vāk citta praṇāma vajra bandha namaḥ karaomi.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ma 'tshal na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ma 'tshal na /
translated: The mudrā is as follows: O Blessed Ones, since I do not know the tathāgatas,

original: de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags /
translated: what is thatness?

original: ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should I practice?

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then all the tathāgatas spoke with one voice:

original: rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtogs la /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtogs la /
translated: O son of noble family, contemplate your own mind,

original: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di dga' bar bzlas /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di dga' bar bzlas /
translated: and recite this naturally established mantra with joy:

original: aom tsitta pra ti bandha nam ka ro mi /
analyzed: aom tsitta pra ti bandha nam ka ro mi /
translated: Oṃ citta pratyātma vedanā karaomi.

original: zhes bya bas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba /
analyzed: zhes bya bas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba /
translated: By this, the aggregates, elements, and sense bases are free from all conceptual thoughts of grasped and grasper,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med pa /
translated: non-dual with all tathāgatas,

original: de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems so sor rtogs pa dang / sems rin po che de nyid snying rje chen pos brgyan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba dang /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems so sor rtogs pa dang / sems rin po che de nyid snying rje chen pos brgyan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba dang /
translated: The mind that has the nature of realizing the essence of reality, the mind that is individually discerning, and the mind that is adorned with great compassion, which is like the moon disc, which has the characteristic of being equal to all the Tathagatas.

original: 'di skad gsol to //
analyzed: 'di skad gsol to //
translated: He said this:

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur rtogs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur rtogs so //
translated: Bhagavat, I realize that the Tathagatas are in my heart, like a moon disc.

original: de nas rigs kyi bu sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na /
analyzed: de nas rigs kyi bu sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na /
translated: Then, son of noble family, the mind is naturally luminous,

original: ji ltar sbyangs pa de ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar sbyangs pa de ltar 'gyur te /
translated: and so it becomes just as it is purified.

original: dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like a white cloth that is dyed.

original: der yang rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sngags zlos shig dang rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro//
analyzed: der yang rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sngags zlos shig dang rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro//
translated: There, too, recite the naturally spontaneous mantra, and it will become very clear.

original: @133b aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
analyzed: @133b aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
translated: Oṃ bodhicitta utpādayāmi.

original: zhes bya bas shin tu gsal ba'i byang chub sems bskyed par gyur pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa las rim gyis 'phel bar gyur pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gyur ba las /
analyzed: zhes bya bas shin tu gsal ba'i byang chub sems bskyed par gyur pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa las rim gyis 'phel bar gyur pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gyur ba las /
translated: Having generated the awakening mind in this way, it becomes a moon mandala.🔽Then, as it gradually expands, it becomes a complete moon mandala.

original: 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then, the bodhisattva Samantabhadra makes a request:

original: de bzhin gshegs ba rnams /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba rnams /
translated: “The tathāgatas

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba gang lags pa /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba gang lags pa /
translated: appear like a moon mandala.

original: de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong lags so //
analyzed: de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong lags so //
translated: I see them as a moon mandala.”

original: de nas shin tu rnam par dag pa spros pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa'i sems de nyid la /🔽dzany'a na ri mi bi dza h'um /
analyzed: de nas shin tu rnam par dag pa spros pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa'i sems de nyid la / dzany'a na ri mi bi dza h'um /
translated: Then, from that mind, which is completely pure and free from all elaborations,

original: zhes ba'i sngags kyi rnam par spros te /
analyzed: zhes ba'i sngags kyi rnam par spros te /
translated: the mantra jñānarimii vihūṃ is emanated.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de las 'od zer rnam par sna tshogs pa byung ste /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de las 'od zer rnam par sna tshogs pa byung ste /
translated: From that moon mandala, various light rays emanate.

original: de chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas khang du zhugs nas shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sems ri bo lta bur bcom ste slar rdo rje chen po'i gzugs rtse lnga pa gcig tu gyur nas spyi bo nas thugs kar zhugs te /
analyzed: de chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas khang du zhugs nas shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sems ri bo lta bur bcom ste slar rdo rje chen po'i gzugs rtse lnga pa gcig tu gyur nas spyi bo nas thugs kar zhugs te /
translated: Having entered the immeasurable palace of the dharmadhātu, the mind of all the maṇḍalas of objects of knowledge is destroyed like a mountain, and again becoming a single five-pointed great vajra form, it enters from the crown into the heart.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so //
translated: It is well established in the maṇḍala of the moon.🔽Then, since the essence of all tathāgatas, the bodhicitta of Samantabhadra, has become manifest, you should accomplish it well.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon du gyur gyi de legs par sgrubs shig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon du gyur gyi de legs par sgrubs shig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags
translated: In order to stabilize the bodhicitta of all tathāgatas, the bodhicitta of Samantabhadra, imagine the mantra

original: 'dis rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig / aom tishtha badzra /
analyzed: 'dis rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig / aom tishtha badzra /
translated: oṃ tiṣṭha vajra on the moon maṇḍala in one’s heart in the shape of a vajra.

original: snang bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyis de nas gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag gis mthong ngo //
analyzed: snang bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyis de nas gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag gis mthong ngo //
translated: Having illuminated, all sentient beings then made a request: “Bhagavān, we have seen the tathāgatas on the moon maṇḍala as vajras.”

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rjer zhugs so //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rjer zhugs so //
translated: Then the bodhicitta of all tathāgatas, Samantabhadra, pervading the realm of space, the vajra-like body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas, all of them, through the empowerment of all tathāgatas, entered the bodhisattva’s vajra.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dbyings rdo rje dbyings zhes rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dbyings rdo rje dbyings zhes rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ro //
translated: Then all tathāgatas conferred the vajra name empowerment, “Vajradhātu.”

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag legs par mthong lags so zhes gsol to //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag legs par mthong lags so zhes gsol to //
translated: Then the tathāgatas said, “We have seen the body of all tathāgatas.”

original: sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa @134a * //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na / de bzhin gshegs pa @134a * //
translated: Great being, therefore,

original: thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis 'grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos shig / aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a aa ham /🔽de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la phyag byas te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis 'grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos shig / aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a aa ham / de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la phyag byas te /
translated: recite this mantra of the natural accomplishment of yourself as the body of the Buddha endowed with all supreme aspects, the vajra being of all tathāgatas, as much as you wish: Om, I am the state of all tathāgatas.

original: 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then, having become the tathāgata by meditating on yourself as the tathāgata, bow to those tathāgatas and make this request:

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Bhagavān, all tathāgatas, please empower me.🔽Please stabilize this manifest enlightenment.

original: mngon par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so ;
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so ;
translated: Then all tathāgatas enter that vajra being of the vajra realm.

original: / de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: / de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: Then, at that very moment, he fully awakened to the pristine wisdom of the equality of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so //
translated: He entered the secret pledge of the vajra equality of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so //
translated: He entered the secret pledge of the pristine wisdom of equality through the empowerment of the vajra jewel of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pas rang bzhin gyis dag go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pas rang bzhin gyis dag go //
translated: He realized the pristine wisdom of the equality of all phenomena of all tathāgatas, and so was naturally pure.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o //
translated: He became the source of the pristine wisdom of the equality of all tathāgatas, naturally radiant.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to //
translated: He became a tathāgata, an arhat, a perfectly enlightened buddha.

original: de ltar sems so sor rtogs pa nas brtsams te mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba dang / rin chen tog dang / sh'akya thub pa dang / me tog rgyas pa rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar sems so sor rtogs pa nas brtsams te mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba dang / rin chen tog dang / sh'akya thub pa dang / me tog rgyas pa rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: In this way, beginning with the discernment of the mind and continuing up to the manifest enlightenment, the purification of all the lower realms, the Ratnolkā, the Śākyamuni, and the Puṣpabhikṣu will occur.

original: de rang gi sems las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rang gi sems las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not different from one’s own mind.

original: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas /
analyzed: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas /
translated: Then, from the vajra of the mind of all those tathāgatas, all the tathāgatas emerge.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed /
translated: They generate the gnosis of the sameness of all tathāgatas.

original: nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur /
analyzed: nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur /
translated: They are empowered by the empowerment of the jewel of the sky.

original: kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos chos kyi ye shes bskyed /
analyzed: kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos chos kyi ye shes bskyed /
translated: Avalokiteśvara generates the gnosis of phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas /
translated: They are established in all the activities of all tathāgatas.

original: sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir @134b snying rje'i mig gis sems can thams cad la bltas pa dang / mi shes pa'i las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis dgug par shes nas bdag 'dir sngar bskyed pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa'i dbus na seng ge'i khri de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams las grub
analyzed: sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir @134b snying rje'i mig gis sems can thams cad la bltas pa dang / mi shes pa'i las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis dgug par shes nas bdag 'dir sngar bskyed pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa'i dbus na seng ge'i khri de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams las grub
translated: In order to benefit sentient beings, he looks with eyes of compassion upon all sentient beings and, knowing that they are bound by the karma of ignorance, attachment, aversion, and confusion, he generates himself in the center of the great mansion atop Meru, the king of mountains, which was generated previously.

original: pa'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i ngo bo bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhi pa'i tshul du bzhugs par gyur par bsgom mo //
analyzed: pa'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i ngo bo bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhi pa'i tshul du bzhugs par gyur par bsgom mo //
translated: In the center of that, upon a lion throne created from the merit of the tathāgatas, is the Bhagavat Vairocana, the nature of the body of all tathāgatas, abiding in the form of four faces.

original: de bzhin du glang po che la sogs pa'i khri'i steng du ngan song thams cad sbyong ba la sogs pa yang phyogs bzhi re re gnas par gyur pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin du glang po che la sogs pa'i khri'i steng du ngan song thams cad sbyong ba la sogs pa yang phyogs bzhi re re gnas par gyur pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid de /
translated: Likewise, on the elephant thrones and so forth, the Purifier of All Evil Destinies and so forth are located in the four directions.🔽

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dbyings ni bdag go zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dbyings ni bdag go zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, on the elephant throne and so forth, one should generate the pride that one is purifying all evil destinies and so forth, abiding in each of the four directions, and that one is blessed by all the tathāgatas, and that one is the vajra realm of the body, speech, and mind of all the tathāgatas.

original: de dag gis ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the “concentration of the first application.”

original: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas spyi bo la sogs par byin gyis brlabs la /🔽aom badzra aa dhishth'a na dzny'a na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas spyi bo la sogs par byin gyis brlabs la / aom badzra aa dhishth'a na dzny'a na sa ma ye h'um /
translated: After that, one should bless the crown and so forth with the root seal of the tathāgatas,

original: zhes brjod de /
analyzed: zhes brjod de /
translated: reciting oṃ vajra-adhisthāna-jñāna-samaye hūṃ.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gnyis nas /🔽aom sho dha ni sho dha ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gnyis nas / aom sho dha ni sho dha ni /
translated: Then, from the two eyes of all the tathāgatas,🔽reciting the essence mantra oṃ śodhani śodhani,

original: zhes bya ba'i snying pos sangs rgyas spyan phyung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i snying pos sangs rgyas spyan phyung ste /
translated: one should emit Buddha’s eye.

original: mchod pa thams cad kyis mnyes par byas nas /
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad kyis mnyes par byas nas /
translated: Having pleased them with all offerings,

original: spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa'i spyod bas byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa'i spyod bas byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur to //
translated: through the conduct of emanating and gathering, the object of observation of the thought of awakening, which is a moon maṇḍala, is generated.

original: de bzhin du yang snyan gnyis nas /🔽sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang snyan gnyis nas / sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ni /
translated: Similarly, from the two ears🔽the essence “sarva pāpaṃ viśodhani”

original: zhes bya ba'i snying po las gos dgar mo phyung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i snying po las gos dgar mo phyung ste /
translated: emerges as Pāṇḍaravāsinī,

original: rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to //🔽zhal nas shuddhe bi shuddhe /
analyzed: rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to // zhal nas shuddhe bi shuddhe /
translated: and she resides in her own place.🔽From the mouth

original: zhes bya ba'i snying po las /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i snying po las /
translated: the essence “śuddhe viśuddhe”

original: m'a ma k'i phyung ste /
analyzed: m'a ma k'i phyung ste /
translated: emerges as Māmakī,

original: rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to //🔽shangs nas sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
analyzed: rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to // shangs nas sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
translated: and she resides in her own place.🔽From the nose🔽the essence “sarva karma-āvaraṇa viśodhani svāhā”

original: zhes bya ba'i snying pos sgrol ma byung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i snying pos sgrol ma byung ste /
translated: emerges as Tārā,

original: rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to //
translated: and she resides in her own place.

analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa med pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rje bdud kyi dpung ma lus pa 'joms shing sems can rnams kyi ngan 'gro'i rgyud thams cad gcod par byed pa'i snying po / aom na mo bha ga @135a * // ba ti sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga t'a ya /
translated: Then, the essence of the wisdom vajra arisen from the unequaled bodhicitta of all tathāgatas, which conquers the entire army of māras and severs all the continuums of lower realms of sentient beings,

original: des sems can thams cad kyi snying la zhugs nas sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi rgyud thams cad bcad de /
analyzed: des sems can thams cad kyi snying la zhugs nas sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi rgyud thams cad bcad de /
translated: Having entered the heart of all sentient beings, it severs all the continuums of the lower realms of all sentient beings.

original: slar 'dus ba las 'khor lo'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu drug tu gyur nas gnas bar bsam mo //
analyzed: slar 'dus ba las 'khor lo'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu drug tu gyur nas gnas bar bsam mo //
translated: Again, it gathers back and becomes a moon mandala on the wheel, which is imagined to be sixteen-petaled and abiding.

original: de nas de rnams las ye shes kyi 'od zer byung nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rjer zhugs te /
analyzed: de nas de rnams las ye shes kyi 'od zer byung nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rjer zhugs te /
translated: Then, from those, wisdom light rays emerge and enter the vajra residing in one’s heart.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas /
translated: Through the blessings of all tathāgatas, it becomes a single entity.

original: nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga'i gzugs su gnas pa dang / yang sngar gyi thugs ka'i rdo rje'i tshad du gyur te /🔽de las byung ba'i rang rang gi phyag rgya nyid bsdus pa nas gsungs pa'i ched du brjod pa'am /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga'i gzugs su gnas pa dang / yang sngar gyi thugs ka'i rdo rje'i tshad du gyur te / de las byung ba'i rang rang gi phyag rgya nyid bsdus pa nas gsungs pa'i ched du brjod pa'am /
translated: It becomes the form of a five-pointed vajra extending to the end of space and then becomes the size of the original heart vajra.

original: rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud shlo ka stong phrag bco brgyad pa nas gsungs pa'i ched du brjod pa /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud shlo ka stong phrag bco brgyad pa nas gsungs pa'i ched du brjod pa /
translated: From that, one’s own mudra emerges and recites the extolling of the purpose as taught in the Compendium of Vajra Teachings or the extolling of the purpose as taught in the eighteen-thousand-verse Vajraśekhara Tantra.

original: ae ma ho bdag ni sems dpa' ste //
analyzed: ae ma ho bdag ni sems dpa' ste //
translated: Amazing! I am the hero,

original: mi bskyod rgyal pos byin brlabs shing //
analyzed: mi bskyod rgyal pos byin brlabs shing //
translated: blessed by King Akshobhya,

original: 'gro kun don la sems dpa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'gro kun don la sems dpa'i phyir //
translated: because I think of the welfare of all beings,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod //
translated: I am called Vajrasattva.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod de /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod de /
translated: Thus, with this and other exclamations, he proclaims his exaltation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du /
translated: He is consecrated as the universal monarch of the family of all the tathagatas,

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan la sogs pas dbang bskur nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan la sogs pas dbang bskur nas /
translated: with the crown of the five buddhas, and so forth.

original: gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rang rang gi phyag rgya rnam par dag pas gnas par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rang rang gi phyag rgya rnam par dag pas gnas par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that he is seated on a golden wheel with sixteen spokes, upon a moon mandala, in the pure form of his own seal.

original: de'i 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas gsang sngags chen mo de nyid las sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
analyzed: de'i 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas gsang sngags chen mo de nyid las sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
translated: At the rim of that wheel, from the hearts of all the tathagatas, from that very great mantra, the goddesses such as Lalita arise on moon mandalas.

original: ae ma ho bdag ni sgeg mo ste //
analyzed: ae ma ho bdag ni sgeg mo ste //
translated: Amazing! I am Lalita,

original: rol pa'i rgyal pos byin brlabs shing //
analyzed: rol pa'i rgyal pos byin brlabs shing //
translated: The king of play blessed me,

original: yid 'phrog phyir ni rab sgeg pas //
analyzed: yid 'phrog phyir ni rab sgeg pas //
translated: and I am well adorned for the sake of captivating the mind.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang rang gi ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pas gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang rang gi ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pas gnas par gyur to //
translated: Thus, with such individual exclamations, they remained in their respective places.

original: sgo rnams su ni gsang sngags chen mo de nyid las rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa spros te //
analyzed: sgo rnams su ni gsang sngags chen mo de nyid las rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa spros te //
translated: At the gates, from that great mantra itself, the vajra hook and so forth were emanated.

original: ae ma ho bdag ni lcags @135b kyu ste //
analyzed: ae ma ho bdag ni lcags @135b kyu ste //
translated: Amazing! I am the hook,

original: thugs rje'i rgyal pos byin brlabs shing //
analyzed: thugs rje'i rgyal pos byin brlabs shing //
translated: blessed by the compassionate king,

original: 'gro kun ngan song las 'dren phyir //
analyzed: 'gro kun ngan song las 'dren phyir //
translated: in order to lead all beings from the lower realms,

original: rdo rje lcags kyu zhes byar brjod //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu zhes byar brjod //
translated: I am called the vajra hook.

original: ces pa la sogs pa'i ched du brjod pas rang rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur /
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa'i ched du brjod pas rang rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur /
translated: Thus, with such exclamations, they remained in their respective places.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas mchod pa thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas mchod pa thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Then, from the hearts of all the tathagatas, in order to expand all offerings,

original: aom sarba sam sk'a ra pa ri sho dha ni dharm'a te ga ga na sa mungga te ma h'a ya na pa ri g'a re sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarba sam sk'a ra pa ri sho dha ni dharm'a te ga ga na sa mungga te ma h'a ya na pa ri g'a re sv'a h'a /
translated: Om sarva samskara pariśodhani dharma te gagana samudgate maha yana parigare svaha.

original: zhes brjod pa las rta babs kyi khyams rnams su byams pa la sogs pa bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur pa dang / rdo rje la sogs pa'i dbang gi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes brjod pa las rta babs kyi khyams rnams su byams pa la sogs pa bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur pa dang / rdo rje la sogs pa'i dbang gi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya ste /
translated: Having said that, the bodhisattvas of the good eon, such as Maitreya, and so on, in the courtyard of the archways, are seated on their respective moon discs, and one should seal them with the four seals of the empowerment, such as the vajra, and so on.

original: de la de dag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya las thams cad bcing bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la de dag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya las thams cad bcing bar byed pa'o //
translated: Therein, the pledge seal is the seal of the essence of the tathagatas, which binds all.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya ni lce la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs las sprul pa'i sngags nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya ni lce la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs las sprul pa'i sngags nyid do //
translated: The doctrine seal is the mantra itself, emanated from the mind of the tathagata on a moon disc at the tongue.

original: las kyi phyag rgya ni de dag gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams pa las /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya ni de dag gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams pa las /
translated: The action seal is the contemplation of a variegated vajra at their hearts.

original: kun kyang sgeg par ldan pa ste //
analyzed: kun kyang sgeg par ldan pa ste //
translated: All of them are endowed with charm.

original: gung mdzub me tog 'dra ba ni //
analyzed: gung mdzub me tog 'dra ba ni //
translated: The middle finger and thumb are like a flower.

original: byams pa'i phyag rgya yin pa ste //
analyzed: byams pa'i phyag rgya yin pa ste //
translated: This is the seal of Maitreya.

original: g-yon pa dkur btsugs g-yas pa ni //
analyzed: g-yon pa dkur btsugs g-yas pa ni //
translated: The left hand is placed on the hip, and the right

original: gung mdzub mig 'dra don yod grub //
analyzed: gung mdzub mig 'dra don yod grub //
translated: The index finger like an eye is Amoghasiddhi.🔽From that, the index finger is bent like a hook;

original: de las mdzub mo lcags kyur bkug / ngan song kun 'dren yin par bshad //
analyzed: de las mdzub mo lcags kyur bkug / ngan song kun 'dren yin par bshad //
translated: it is explained to be the guide of all evil destinies.

original: de las dbyug pa'i tshul byas pa //
analyzed: de las dbyug pa'i tshul byas pa //
translated: From that, one makes the form of a club;

original: mya ngan kun 'joms yin pa ste //
analyzed: mya ngan kun 'joms yin pa ste //
translated: it is the destroyer of all suffering.

original: g-yon pa lte bar gnas pa ni //
analyzed: g-yon pa lte bar gnas pa ni //

original: 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i nyan thos chen po brgyad dang / ser skya la sogs pa'i 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang / stobs po che la sogs pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad dang / seng ge'i mgo la sogs pa pho nya chen po brgyad sprul par bya'o //

translated: The eight great hearers such as Ārya Ānanda, the noble pratyekabuddhas such as Kapila, the eight great wrathful ones such as Mahābala, and the eight great messengers such as Siṃhamukha should be emanated.

original: de bzhin du rim pa ji lta bas de'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol la ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rim pa ji lta bas de'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol la ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams bsam par bya ste /

translated: such as the four great kings such as Dhṛtarāṣṭra, the directional guardians such as Śakra, the eight great planets such as the sun, the twenty-seven lunar mansions such as Aśvinī, and the eight great sages such as Vasiṣṭha.

original: sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i rje bo brgyad dang / de dag gi phyi rol du ni 'dzam bu'i gling dang / lus 'phags po dang / ba lang spyod dang / sgra mi snyan dang / 'gro ba drug tu gnas pa'i sa 'og dang /

translated: The eight worldly lords such as Rahula and so forth, as well as the outer world of Jambudvipa, Videha, Godaniya, Kuru, the six realms, the lower realms,🔽the upper realms, and the entire realm of the earth were all illuminated by the great light of the bhagavat. All of them were free from the extreme of nonvirtue and possessed all virtuous physical, verbal, and mental karma.

analyzed: thams cad dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rgyas par gyur te /

translated: With the palms of the hands joined at the crown of the head, one should imagine that the Blessed One and the maṇḍala of the Purifier of All Evil Destinies are fully present.

analyzed: aom badzra nee tri h'um h'a sa su satva sam gra ham /

original: de ltar bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis rgyas par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi 'od zer chen pos dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum /

analyzed: rgyal ba thams cad skyed par byed pa'i lha mo lngas theg pa chen po'i bum pa bla na med pa'i dbang /

analyzed: lus thams cad la ye shes kyi 'od zer chen pos gsal bar byas nas /

analyzed: // / de dag gis ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
translated: By those, the samādhi called “Supreme Victor of the Maṇḍala” is taught.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las ye shes kyi 'od zer dri ma med pa des snang bar byas pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas /

analyzed: yang 'od zer byung ba de nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi snying la zhugs so //
translated: the light rays arose and entered the hearts of all sentient beings.

original: de nas sems can gyi ngan 'gro'i rgyud thams cad bcad nas slar thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs su gyur to //

translated: Then, having severed all the continuums of sentient beings' miserable realms, the five-pronged vajra on the moon disk in the heart became the form of the pervasiveness of the realm of space.

analyzed: de'i lte ba la gnas pa byang chub kyi sems rin po che yongs su dag pa /
