analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar byed pa'i 'od zer la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa bzhi
translated: The four sugatas, such as Purifier of All Evil Destinies,

original: ni rang rang gi phyag rdo rje la sogs pa phyag g-yas pa na bsnams shing /
analyzed: ni rang rang gi phyag rdo rje la sogs pa phyag g-yas pa na bsnams shing /
translated: each hold a vajra and so on in their right hands.🔽In their four left hands they hold a vajra hook with light rays.

original: phyag g-yon pa rdo rje'i lcags kyu 'od zer dang bcas pa bsnams pa'i phyag bzhir rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis yang dag par gnas te /
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa rdo rje'i lcags kyu 'od zer dang bcas pa bsnams pa'i phyag bzhir rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis yang dag par gnas te /
translated: They are perfectly situated in the forms of Vajrasattva and so on.

original: sems can thams cad la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjes dgug par mdzad pa dang / sems dag pa dang bcas par mdzad pa dang / yid @138b dang bar mdzad pa dang / rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjes dgug par mdzad pa dang / sems dag pa dang bcas par mdzad pa dang / yid @138b dang bar mdzad pa dang / rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba dang /
translated: It is the generation of the mind of awakening in all sentient beings. It is the summoning through the compassion of the thus-gone ones. It is the purification of the mind. It is the delight of the mind. It is the empowerment of the vajra jewel.

original: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba dang / sbyin pa phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa dang / 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la nges par sbyor ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa dang /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba dang / sbyin pa phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa dang / 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la nges par sbyor ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa dang /
translated: It is the dispelling of the darkness of ignorance. It is the perfection of generosity. It is the application to the marvelous smile. It is the perfection of the pure absorption. It is the cutting through of all afflictions.

original: bdud dpung ma lus pa rtsad nas 'byin par mdzad pa dang / lkugs pa thams cad smra bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa mdzad pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad srung ba dang / bsrung ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /
analyzed: bdud dpung ma lus pa rtsad nas 'byin par mdzad pa dang / lkugs pa thams cad smra bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa mdzad pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad srung ba dang / bsrung ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /
translated: He completely destroys all the armies of demons, he makes all the mute speak, he makes offerings to all the tathagatas, he protects from all fears, he completely protects all those who are protected,

original: lus dang / dag dang sems mnyam pa nyid du gcig par mdzad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: lus dang / dag dang sems mnyam pa nyid du gcig par mdzad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la sbyor ba dang /
translated: he makes the body, speech, and mind of all beings the same, he joins them to the gate of liberation that is emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, and non-composition,

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / smon lam dang / thabs rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / smon lam dang / thabs rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug pa dang /
translated: he perfects generosity, morality, patience, diligence, concentration, wisdom, aspiration, and skillful means, and he leads all beings to the city of great liberation.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyod pa la gzhug pa dang / theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi sems 'jig par mdzad pa dang / rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing skye ba med par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa la skyong bar mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyod pa la gzhug pa dang / theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi sems 'jig par mdzad pa dang / rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing skye ba med par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa la skyong bar mdzad pa ste /
translated: They are: to introduce them to the practice of the ten perfections; to destroy the minds of those who aspire to the Lesser Vehicle; to make them naturally luminous and unborn; and to care for the immeasurable conduct of all sentient beings.

original: slar sems can thams cad dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor du bkug ste bcug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las sprul pa'i bum pa dang / phyag rgya dang / phred ba la sogs pa'i dbang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: slar sems can thams cad dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor du bkug ste bcug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las sprul pa'i bum pa dang / phyag rgya dang / phred ba la sogs pa'i dbang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Then, together with all sentient beings, they should be summoned into the maṇḍala of the purification of all lower realms by all tathāgatas, and having been admitted, they should be empowered by the vase emanated from the Bhagavān’s heart, and by the mudrā, the rosary, and so forth, in the proper sequence.

original: dbang bskur ba las khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sras po nyid du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba las khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sras po nyid du gyur pa ste /
translated: By the empowerment, all sentient beings of the three realms become the heirs.

original: thams cad du yang rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba las kun kyang bskal pa 'di snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar mtshan gcig par gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad du yang rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba las kun kyang bskal pa 'di snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar mtshan gcig par gyur te /
translated: In all of those, they were all given the name empowerment of Vajra, and all of them became the Tathagata called Vimalaprabha, with the same name.

original: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
analyzed: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
translated: Having made offerings with a collection of offerings,

original: yang de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu /🔽kye ma rnam snang rdo rje yis //
analyzed: yang de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu / kye ma rnam snang rdo rje yis //
translated: all of them with one voice🔽praised him, saying:🔽“Oh! The deeds of Vairochana Vajra

original: sangs rgyas mdzad pa ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mdzad pa ngo mtshar che //
translated: are most wondrous,

original: gang phyir ngan song ltung @139a * //
analyzed: gang phyir ngan song ltung @139a * //
translated: because those who have fallen into the lower realms

original: ba yi // sems can glog bzhin myur du sgrol //🔽zhes yongs su bstod pas bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: ba yi // sems can glog bzhin myur du sgrol // zhes yongs su bstod pas bsam par bya'o //
translated: are quickly liberated like lightning.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad nam mkha'i khams mthas gtugs pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho thams cad du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan par byas nas gnas par byas
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad nam mkha'i khams mthas gtugs pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho thams cad du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan par byas nas gnas par byas
translated: Then all those Tathagatas, abiding in the realm of space, in all the infinite oceans, on top of eight-petaled lotuses, seated on moon discs, with the mudra of samadhi,

analyzed: la / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ni rab tu gsal ba'i bdag nyid du gnas par gyur to //
translated: The maṇḍala wheels of the tathāgatas remain in the nature of clarity.

analyzed: de dag gis ni las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to /
translated: This explains the samādhi called “the supreme victory of activity.”

original: // / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rtsibs bcu drug pa'i gzugs /🔽rdo rje'i dbyings chen po ste /
analyzed: // / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rtsibs bcu drug pa'i gzugs / rdo rje'i dbyings chen po ste /
translated: Then, the maṇḍala of all the tathāgatas is the sixteen-spoked wheel in the moon maṇḍala in the heart of the Bhagavān Vairocana.

original: thams cad kyang rdo rje'i bu tshur mkhrig ma bsnol la bzlog cing bzlog pas se gol gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rdo rje'i bu tshur mkhrig ma bsnol la bzlog cing bzlog pas se gol gdab par bya ste /
translated: The great vajra realm is all vajra fists with the wrists crossed and turned back.🔽Snap one’s fingers,

original: se gol de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu'i gzugs su gnas pa las rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yum thams cad /
analyzed: se gol de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu'i gzugs su gnas pa las rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yum thams cad /
translated: and from that finger snap, which is in the form of a vajra hook, all bodhisattvas such as Vajrasattva, all tathāgatas, and all the mothers of the tathāgata families

original: aom badzra sa m'a dza: dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: aom badzra sa m'a dza: dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: With Om vajra samājaḥ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ,

original: zhes bya bas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba las rdo rje bsdu bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya bas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba las rdo rje bsdu bar bya ste /
translated: one should summon, induct, bind, and control the vajra action of gathering.

original: de nyid du 'khod par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad 'dus par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid du 'khod par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad 'dus par gyur pa ste /
translated: Having become seated there, all the bodies, voices, and minds of all the tathāgatas gather into the vajra.

original: de nyid mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rgyas par byas la /
analyzed: de nyid mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rgyas par byas la /
translated: Having been expanded by the host of offerings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs rdo rje chen po'i lte ba la gnas par gyur nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs rdo rje chen po'i lte ba la gnas par gyur nas /
translated: the form of the seal of the tathāgatas is situated in the center of the great vajra.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad thugs kyi yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i thig le la gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad thugs kyi yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i thig le la gnas par gyur to //
translated: The entire infinite buddha field is situated in the bindu of the supreme syllable of mind.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis rgyas par gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rab tu gnas shing /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis rgyas par gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rab tu gnas shing /
translated: Then, one should abide in the single-pointed mind, the great Bhagavān Vairocana, who is adorned with all the ornaments, who is filled with all the great qualities of the Tathāgata,

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba thams cad du thogs pa med par gyur pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba thams cad du thogs pa med par gyur pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyis gnas par bya'o //
translated: who is naturally luminous, who is unobstructed in every way, and who is abiding in the single-pointed mind.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams @139b cad kyi thugs kar gnas pa de nyid la sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyis ni bdag nyid kyi sems /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams @139b cad kyi thugs kar gnas pa de nyid la sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyis ni bdag nyid kyi sems /
translated: Then, one should abide in the single-pointed mind, which is located at the heart of all the tathāgatas,

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings su gyur pa rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i bdag nyid du gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings su gyur pa rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i bdag nyid du gyur to //
translated: and one’s own mind becomes the Bhagavān Vairocana, the nature of the realm of all the tathāgatas, the nature of the great ocean.

original: de ltar ji srid du skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar de srid du bsgoms la /
analyzed: de ltar ji srid du skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar de srid du bsgoms la /
translated: In this way, one should meditate for as long as one does not become weary.

original: de nas rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sbyor bas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sbyor bas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
translated: Then, one should recite the mantra with the application of Mahāvairocana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rig pa chen mo rtsa ba'i sngags zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu byung ba dang / ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang rtsa ba'i rig pa chen mo de nyid la brten te rang rang gi snying po'i sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsams nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa la brtson par byas na
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rig pa chen mo rtsa ba'i sngags zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu byung ba dang / ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang rtsa ba'i rig pa chen mo de nyid la brten te rang rang gi snying po'i sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsams nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa la brtson par byas na
translated: By striving in vajra repetition,

original: / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi bzlas pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi bzlas pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: one performs the repetition of all the deities of the mandala.

original: de ltar rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'bum phrag dang / stong phrag dang / brgya phrag la sogs pa bzlas nas mnyam par gzhag pa las langs par gyur pa'i tshe mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'bum phrag dang / stong phrag dang / brgya phrag la sogs pa bzlas nas mnyam par gzhag pa las langs par gyur pa'i tshe mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Thus, having performed a hundred thousand, ten thousand, a hundred, or so forth, repetitions of vajra repetition, when one rises from equipoise, one should make offerings with all offerings,

original: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas kyang bstod par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas kyang bstod par bya'o //
translated: and one should also praise with the one hundred and eight names.

original: de nas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de nas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
translated: Then, all phenomena are the nature of the absence of reference.🔽Beginning with the vajra hook,🔽all the mudras are released up to Vajradhātvīśvarī.

original: rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings kyi bar du phyag rgya thams cad bkrol la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya dam pas bkrol zhing /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings kyi bar du phyag rgya thams cad bkrol la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya dam pas bkrol zhing /
translated: With the supreme mudra of Vajradhara,

original: badzra mu: zhes pas phyag rgya thams cad nam mkha'i phyogs su bstan la /
analyzed: badzra mu: zhes pas phyag rgya thams cad nam mkha'i phyogs su bstan la /
translated: say vajra muḥ and display all the mudras to the space direction.🔽With the application of vajra armor, gather the deities into oneself in the same way as before.

original: rdo rje go cha'i sbyor bas bdag nyid la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsdu ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i go bgos la yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas dngos grub blang ste /
analyzed: rdo rje go cha'i sbyor bas bdag nyid la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsdu ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i go bgos la yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas dngos grub blang ste /
translated: Put on the armor of the vajra cross and take the accomplishments by reciting the hundred-syllable mantra.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang bral bar /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang bral bar /
translated: “ By this root of merit, may all sentient beings be free from all nonvirtuous physical, verbal, and mental activities.

original: dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang ldan par gyur nas /
analyzed: dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang ldan par gyur nas /
translated: May they possess all virtuous physical, verbal, and mental activities.

original: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad spangs nas /
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad spangs nas /
translated: May they abandon all suffering and mental dissatisfaction.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sa la gnas par gyur cig ces dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sa la gnas par gyur cig ces dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: One should dedicate the roots of virtue with the thought, May I attain the stage of the Great Illuminator, the Blessed One.

original: de nas me tog lag par thogs pas /
analyzed: de nas me tog lag par thogs pas /
translated: Then, holding flowers in one's hands,🔽one should request forbearance with the thought that one has transgressed the seals, mantras,

original: bdag gi phyag rgya sngags rnams dang // bsam gtan 'khrul dang nyams pa rnams //
analyzed: bdag gi phyag rgya sngags rnams dang // bsam gtan 'khrul dang nyams pa rnams //
translated: and meditative absorptions,

original: de bzhin lha tshogs nyams pa kun //🔽dkyil 'khor bcas pas bzod par mdzod //
analyzed: de bzhin lha tshogs nyams pa kun // dkyil 'khor bcas pas bzod par mdzod //
translated: and that one has transgressed the assembly of deities,🔽saying,

original: ces bzod par @140a * //
analyzed: ces bzod par @140a * //
translated: Forbearance is requested with the thought,🔽All tathāgatas depart into the realm of phenomena, and one should generate the conviction that the deities are proclaimed in the sky with various musical sounds.

original: gsol la / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis rol mo sna tshogs pa nam mkha' las sgrogs pas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de /
analyzed: gsol la / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis rol mo sna tshogs pa nam mkha' las sgrogs pas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de /
translated: One should request the departure with the thought, Please return!🔽saying,

original: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
analyzed: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
translated: Oṃ, you who perform all benefits for sentient beings,

original: ji ltar mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: ji ltar mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
translated: grant spiritual powers in accordance with the situation,

original: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
translated: and having departed to the realm of the buddhas,

original: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
translated: please return again.

original: zhes bya bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gshegs su gsol bar bya'o /
analyzed: zhes bya bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gshegs su gsol bar bya'o /
translated: Thus, one should request the departure of all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: // / de nas nyams pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pa mngon par brtson pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams kyi don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: // / de nas nyams pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pa mngon par brtson pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams kyi don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las bya ba nyid de /
translated: Then, the vajra master who is a yogi/nī of uncorrupted yoga, who is diligent, should perform the rite of the maṇḍala, and so forth, for the sake of the disciples.

original: de yang re zhig dang por gnas gtsang ma rang gi yid dang rjes su mthun pa rnams su nyi ma bzang po la rab tu zhugs la ba'i rnam pa lnga dang / dri dang byug ba la sogs pas nye reg byas te /
analyzed: de yang re zhig dang por gnas gtsang ma rang gi yid dang rjes su mthun pa rnams su nyi ma bzang po la rab tu zhugs la ba'i rnam pa lnga dang / dri dang byug ba la sogs pas nye reg byas te /
translated: Moreover, first, in a clean place that is agreeable to one’s mind, on an auspicious day, having entered, having performed the five-part self-purification, having purified with scent, ointment, and so forth,

original: aa ga ru la sogs pa'i bdug pas bdugs shing spos kyi dkyil 'khor khru drug pa'am /🔽khru bzhi pa'am /
analyzed: aa ga ru la sogs pa'i bdug pas bdugs shing spos kyi dkyil 'khor khru drug pa'am / khru bzhi pa'am /
translated: having perfumed with incense such as aloe, having made a circle of incense that is six cubits,🔽four cubits,

original: khru do pa byas pa /
analyzed: khru do pa byas pa /
translated: or two cubits,

original: de'i rjes su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa snying dang ze 'brur ldan pa bris te /
analyzed: de'i rjes su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa snying dang ze 'brur ldan pa bris te /
translated: having drawn an eight-petaled lotus with a pericarp and filaments,

original: de'i steng du bum pa dkar po gcig la rigs lnga'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa rnam par snang mdzad bskyed pa'i nang du /
analyzed: de'i steng du bum pa dkar po gcig la rigs lnga'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa rnam par snang mdzad bskyed pa'i nang du /
translated: On top of that, place a white vase marked with the seals of the five families.

original: sman dang / spos dang / rin po che dang ; 'bru la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa bcug ste /
analyzed: sman dang / spos dang / rin po che dang ; 'bru la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa bcug ste /
translated: Inside the vase, which is generated as Vairocana, place medicine, incense, jewels, grain, and so forth, consecrated with the essence of the tathāgatas.

original: ras dkar pos mgul la dkris shing me tog phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa bzhag ste /
analyzed: ras dkar pos mgul la dkris shing me tog phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa bzhag ste /
translated: Cover the neck with a white cloth and adorn it with flower garlands and so forth.

original: de'i shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma la bgegs mthar byed kyi bum pa snga ma lta bu bzhag la /
analyzed: de'i shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma la bgegs mthar byed kyi bum pa snga ma lta bu bzhag la /
translated: Place the vase of Vighnāntakṛt on the petal to the east, as before.

original: dkar po la sogs pa'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pas btags te /
analyzed: dkar po la sogs pa'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pas btags te /
translated: Tie it with a string of five colors, such as white, and so forth.

original: mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod nas /
analyzed: mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod nas /
translated: Make perfect offerings with the five offerings.

original: stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
analyzed: stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
translated: Sit on a comfortable seat.

original: yi ge brgya pas sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge brgya pas sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya'o //
translated: Confess all misdeeds with the one-hundred-syllable mantra.

original: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa bsgoms la /
translated: Then, meditate on the natural purity of all phenomena.

original: mdun gyi bar snang la nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa'i sems las padma dmar po 'dab ma stong dang ldan pas khyab par gyur pa dang / de'i steng du h'um nag po las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od dang bcas pa bsams la /
analyzed: mdun gyi bar snang la nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa'i sems las padma dmar po 'dab ma stong dang ldan pas khyab par gyur pa dang / de'i steng du h'um nag po las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od dang bcas pa bsams la /
translated: Upon that, from a black hūṃ, one imagines a five-pronged vajra with light.

original: de gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen por bsams te /
analyzed: de gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen por bsams te /
translated: From that, one imagines oneself as Bhagavat Vairocana.

original: snying ga dang / dbral ba @140b dang ; lkog ma dang / spyi bo rnams su sangs rgyas spyan dang / m'a ma k'i dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma rnams sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis rgyas btab la /🔽ma h'a sa ma ya satva ha /
analyzed: snying ga dang / dbral ba @140b dang ; lkog ma dang / spyi bo rnams su sangs rgyas spyan dang / m'a ma k'i dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma rnams sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis rgyas btab la / ma h'a sa ma ya satva ha /
translated: One seals the heart, forehead, throat, and head with Buddhalocanā, Māmakī, Pāṇḍaravāsinī, and Tārā in the form of Cittavajrā, and so on.

original: zhes brjod do //
analyzed: zhes brjod do //
translated: One recites “mahāsamayasattva hūṃ.”

original: de las rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya bcas pas /🔽aom badzra tsakra h'um /
analyzed: de las rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya bcas pas / aom badzra tsakra h'um /
translated: From that, with the gesture of the vajra wheel,

original: zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pas /
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pas /
translated: one recites the mantra “oṃ vajra cakra hūṃ” seven times.

original: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus par sprul la phyag rgya bzhis nye bar spyad par bya'o //🔽de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas /
analyzed: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus par sprul la phyag rgya bzhis nye bar spyad par bya'o // de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas /
translated: Having emanated the entire maṇḍala of the Cakrasaṃvara who purifies all lower realms, one should enjoy the four mudras.🔽Then, with the vajra hook and so on,

original: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la /🔽dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho aa ham /
analyzed: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la / dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho aa ham /
translated: summon, induct, bind, and control the wheel of pristine consciousness.

original: zhes brjod de /
analyzed: zhes brjod de /
translated: Say jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ, samaya stvaṃ, samaya homo ’haṃ.

original: mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod do //
analyzed: mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod do //
translated: Having offered all the hosts of offerings,

original: de nas mthun pa'i bar du mchod pa dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la /
analyzed: de nas mthun pa'i bar du mchod pa dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la /
translated: then offer the pleasing offerings and praise with the one hundred and eight names.

original: rgyal po'i ni zla ba gsum pa'am /
analyzed: rgyal po'i ni zla ba gsum pa'am /
translated: For a king, it is three months,

original: blon po'i zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
analyzed: blon po'i zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
translated: for a minister, twenty-one days,

original: dmangs rigs rnams kyi ni zhag bdun pa'o //
analyzed: dmangs rigs rnams kyi ni zhag bdun pa'o //
translated: and for a commoner, seven days.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i ni ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi bar du ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i ni ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi bar du ste /
translated: For a yogin, it is as long as the signs do not arise.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la ni 'bum phrag gam brgya phrag re re'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la ni 'bum phrag gam brgya phrag re re'o //
translated: For the five Tathagatas, it is one hundred thousand or one hundred each.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ni thams cad du de'i dbye ba nyid las shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ni thams cad du de'i dbye ba nyid las shes par bya ste /
translated: For Vajrasattva and so on, it is to be understood everywhere from the division of that.

original: tha ma'i tshang la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsungs so //
analyzed: tha ma'i tshang la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsungs so //
translated: In the last case, it is said to be twenty-one.

original: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni rtsa ba'i sngags nyid de /
analyzed: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni rtsa ba'i sngags nyid de /
translated: There, for Vairochana, it is the root mantra itself.

original: de bzhin du ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Similarly, for Suparikirtita and so on,

original: aom sarba p'a pam /
analyzed: aom sarba p'a pam /
translated: it is Om sarva papa

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: and so on.

original: bskal pa bzang po'i ni /
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po'i ni /

analyzed: aom badzra yaksha h'um /

original: zhes bzlas pa'i srung skud mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa dpung pa g-yas pa la bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bzlas pa'i srung skud mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa dpung pa g-yas pa la bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Recite this and tie the protection cord with three knots on the right upper arm.🔽Then say, “Good people, go now.

original: de nas bzhin bzang dag longs shig / sang gi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba dang khyed kyis dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur gyis /
analyzed: de nas bzhin bzang dag longs shig / sang gi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba dang khyed kyis dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur gyis /
translated: When the sun’s mandala rises tomorrow, you will see the great mandala of the glorious Tantra of All the Pure Mandalas.

original: ji ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam dag kyang smros shig / ces brjod la slar gtang bar bya ste /
analyzed: ji ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam dag kyang smros shig / ces brjod la slar gtang bar bya ste /
translated: Tell me your dreams as you saw them.”

original: de nas nang par mtshan mo'i mthar slob dpon la rmi lam bzang pa dang / ngan pa thams cad brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas nang par mtshan mo'i mthar slob dpon la rmi lam bzang pa dang / ngan pa thams cad brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then, at the end of the night, the master should be told all the good and bad dreams.

original: de la rmi lam ni dkon mchog gsum mthong ba dang / pha ma dang bla ma mthong ba dang / chu las rgal ba la sogs ni bzang por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de la rmi lam ni dkon mchog gsum mthong ba dang / pha ma dang bla ma mthong ba dang / chu las rgal ba la sogs ni bzang por gyur pa'o //
translated: Among them, seeing the Three Jewels, seeing one’s father, mother, or guru, and so on, and crossing over water are good.

original: rigs ngan la sogs pa dang phrad pa dang / khyi phag la sogs pa mi rigs pa spyod pa mthong ba ni /
analyzed: rigs ngan la sogs pa dang phrad pa dang / khyi phag la sogs pa mi rigs pa spyod pa mthong ba ni /
translated: Meeting with an outcaste and so on, and seeing dogs, pigs, and so on, acting in an improper way,

original: shis par mi 'gyur bas sbyin sreg la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: shis par mi 'gyur bas sbyin sreg la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Since it is not auspicious, one should perform a fire sacrifice and so forth.

original: de nas lce la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um las rdo rje bsams la /
analyzed: de nas lce la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um las rdo rje bsams la /
translated: Then, on one's tongue, one should visualize a vajra arisen from a hūṃ on top of a moon disc.

original: de'i lte bar hr'i las padma dmar po bsams la /
analyzed: de'i lte bar hr'i las padma dmar po bsams la /
translated: In its center, one should visualize a red lotus arisen from a hrīḥ.

original: de'i steng du rang ting nge 'dzin las nges par 'byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: de'i steng du rang ting nge 'dzin las nges par 'byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa rnam par bsams la /
translated: On top of that, one should visualize Amitābha arisen from one's concentration.

original: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hr'i: rnam par bkod de /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hr'i: rnam par bkod de /
translated: At his heart, on a moon disc, one should arrange a hrīḥ.

original: aom padma sva ra sva ti syetta ya h'um hr'i ram /
analyzed: aom padma sva ra sva ti syetta ya h'um hr'i ram /
translated: Om padmasattvasya hṛdayaṃ hūṃ hrīḥ.

original: zhes byas la byin gyis brlabs par byas la /
analyzed: zhes byas la byin gyis brlabs par byas la /
translated: Having blessed it in this way,

original: bdug spos lag tu thogs nas spyan drang bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: bdug spos lag tu thogs nas spyan drang bar bya ba ni /
translated: one should invite [Amitābha] while holding incense in one's hand:

original: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The buddhas dwelling in the ten directions,

original: sras bcas 'jig rten rnam grags pa //
analyzed: sras bcas 'jig rten rnam grags pa //
translated: together with their heirs, renowned in the world,🔽the vajra, jewel families,

original: rdo rje rin chen rigs dag dang // de bzhin padma las kyi rigs //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen rigs dag dang // de bzhin padma las kyi rigs //
translated: and likewise the lotus and action families,

original: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang // gang yang lha yi tshogs rnams kun //
analyzed: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang // gang yang lha yi tshogs rnams kun //
translated: The essence mantras and mudras, and all the hosts of deities,

original: chos kyi dbyings la nges zhugs pa //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la nges zhugs pa //
translated: All definitely abiding in the dharmadhātu,

original: de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol //
translated: Please consider me!

original: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
analyzed: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
translated: I, named so-and-so,

original: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
translated: Out of love for my disciples and in order to make offerings to you all,

original: ci 'byor pa yi yo byad kyis //
analyzed: ci 'byor pa yi yo byad kyis //
translated: With whatever provisions I have🔽In the supreme city of the nature of the dharmadhātu,

original: chos dbyings rang bzhin grong @144b khyer mchog / sang ni dkyil 'khor bri legs kyis //
analyzed: chos dbyings rang bzhin grong @144b khyer mchog / sang ni dkyil 'khor bri legs kyis //
translated: Tomorrow the maṇḍala will be drawn well,

original: sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod //
analyzed: sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod //
translated: So please remain in the preparatory rite.”

original: tses lan gsum brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: tses lan gsum brjod par bya ste /
translated: Recite that three times.

original: de dag ni lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: de dag ni lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: That is the ritual of the preparatory rite.

original: de nas nyi ma 'chur kar legs par khrus byas shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bde ba dang ldan pas so so'i srad bu dag tshon sna lnga la rim pa bzhin du bsogs la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa stong pa nyid du
analyzed: de nas nyi ma 'chur kar legs par khrus byas shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bde ba dang ldan pas so so'i srad bu dag tshon sna lnga la rim pa bzhin du bsogs la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa stong pa nyid du
translated: Then, at dawn, having bathed well and adorned with all ornaments, with a happy mind, the individual threads of the five colors should be gathered in order, and all phenomena are purified by nature into emptiness.

original: bsams la / aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'an badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: bsams la / aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'an badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: oṃ śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'haṃ.

original: zhes bya'o // de'i rjes la h'um la sogs pa rang rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i srad bu'i 'od zer rnams rang gi phyogs su mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang gi phyogs na gnas pa rnams kyi gan du btang la /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de'i rjes la h'um la sogs pa rang rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i srad bu'i 'od zer rnams rang gi phyogs su mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang gi phyogs na gnas pa rnams kyi gan du btang la /
translated: After that, the light rays of the thread that arise from the individual seed syllables such as hūṃ and so on are sent to the directions of Akṣobhya and so on, who reside in their respective directions.

original: 'bar ba'i lcags kyus drangs la /
analyzed: 'bar ba'i lcags kyus drangs la /
translated: They are drawn with blazing hooks.

original: de rnams kyi rang gi lag pa na gnas pa'i srad bu rnams legs par bkang la /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang gi lag pa na gnas pa'i srad bu rnams legs par bkang la /
translated: The threads that are held in their hands are filled well.

original: aom aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharmm'a /
analyzed: aom aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharmm'a /
translated: oṃ anyonya anu gata sarva dharmāṃ

original: spha ra spha ra /
analyzed: spha ra spha ra /
translated: sphāra sphāra

original: aa nu pra bishta sarba dharmm'a aa tyenta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a h'um /
analyzed: aa nu pra bishta sarba dharmm'a aa tyenta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a h'um /
translated: anu praviṣṭa sarva dharmā atyanta anu praviṣṭa sarva dharmāṃ hūṃ.

original: zhes bsgril ba la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bsgril ba la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: The wrapping and so on are performed.

original: de nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis ye shes lnga'i ngo bor bsams nas /
analyzed: de nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis ye shes lnga'i ngo bor bsams nas /
translated: Having contemplated that very [thread] in the form of Vairocana and so on as the nature of the five gnoses,

original: rang gi snying ga las grogs po'i rdo rje las h'um dza:/
analyzed: rang gi snying ga las grogs po'i rdo rje las h'um dza:/
translated: the vajra friend is created from one’s heart with hūṃ jaḥ.

original: zhes pa 'dis phyung nas ma dang ta las mig gnyis nyi zlar bskyed de /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis phyung nas ma dang ta las mig gnyis nyi zlar bskyed de /
translated: Having extracted this, the two eyes are generated from ma and ta as the sun and moon.

original: yi ge dzdza: grogs po'i lag tu srad bu gtad de /
analyzed: yi ge dzdza: grogs po'i lag tu srad bu gtad de /
translated: The syllable jjaḥ is placed in the friend's hand as a thread.

original: bar snang la shar la sogs par 'og nas steng du btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor du rdo rje'i thig mu tig lta bus thams cad du gdab cing /
analyzed: bar snang la shar la sogs par 'og nas steng du btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor du rdo rje'i thig mu tig lta bus thams cad du gdab cing /
translated: Having been drawn up into space, it is placed below and above, and the vajra thread is placed everywhere in the maṇḍala with a pearl.

original: aom badzra dzny'a na s'u tra spha ra na h'um /🔽zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra dzny'a na s'u tra spha ra na h'um / zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Say oṃ vajra jñāna sūtra spharana hūṃ.

original: de'i steng na dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bteg nas bzhag nas /
analyzed: de'i steng na dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bteg nas bzhag nas /
translated: Having lifted up the maṇḍala wheel above that,

original: aom badzra s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
translated: say oṃ vajra sūtra mati krama hūṃ,

original: ratna s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
analyzed: ratna s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
translated: ratna sūtra mati krama hūṃ,

original: padma s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
analyzed: padma s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
translated: padma sūtra mati krama hūṃ,

original: karma s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
analyzed: karma s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
translated: and karma sūtra mati krama hūṃ.

original: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje la sogs pa'i thog tu sa'i steng du snang ba dang de'i steng du /
analyzed: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje la sogs pa'i thog tu sa'i steng du snang ba dang de'i steng du /
translated: The maṇḍala of the tathāgatas is placed on the vajra, and so on, on the ground.

original: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra ma ti kra ma h'um /
translated: Say oṃ vajra samaya sūtra mati krama hūṃ.

original: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas la gser la sogs pa'i snod du dri dang 'o ma dang / tsandan dkar po la sogs pas rlon par byas la yi ge dza: sgrub pa'i grogs po la /
analyzed: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas la gser la sogs pa'i snod du dri dang 'o ma dang / tsandan dkar po la sogs pas rlon par byas la yi ge dza: sgrub pa'i grogs po la /
translated: Having recited this one hundred and eight times, in a vessel of gold, etc., moisten with water, milk, and white sandalwood, etc., and with the syllable jra, one should draw the maṇḍala.

original: dza: dza: dza: dza: zhes brjod pas dang por tshangs pa chen po'i thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: dza: dza: dza: dza: zhes brjod pas dang por tshangs pa chen po'i thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: Then, having recited jra jra jra jra, one should first lay down the thread of Brahmā.

original: de nas tshangs pa'i thig gnyis pa btab la /🔽de nas shar la sogs pa rim @145a * //
analyzed: de nas tshangs pa'i thig gnyis pa btab la / de nas shar la sogs pa rim @145a * //
translated: Then, having laid down the second thread of Brahmā,

original: pa bzhin du dgu'i cha ru bgos la /
analyzed: pa bzhin du dgu'i cha ru bgos la /
translated: one should divide the east, etc., into nine parts in order.

original: cha dbus ma la dbus kyi pho brang byas la /
analyzed: cha dbus ma la dbus kyi pho brang byas la /
translated: Having made the central palace in the central part,

original: de nas sgo dang / sgo khyud dang / sgo 'gram dang ya phug dang tva ra na la sogs pa'i thig g-yas skor gyis 'gro bas gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sgo dang / sgo khyud dang / sgo 'gram dang ya phug dang tva ra na la sogs pa'i thig g-yas skor gyis 'gro bas gdab par bya'o //
translated: then, one should lay down the thread of the door, the door frame, the door threshold, the upper part of the door, the tvaṭa, etc., going clockwise.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar seng ldeng gi rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa lta bur h'um las bskyed de /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar seng ldeng gi rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa lta bur h'um las bskyed de /
translated: Then, in the center of the maṇḍala, one should generate a vajra in the shape of a single-pronged vajra of khadira wood, like a five-pronged vajra, from hūṃ.

original: aom badzra k'i li k'i la sarba bandha la dre tim ku ru /🔽zhes pas brdungs la /
analyzed: aom badzra k'i li k'i la sarba bandha la dre tim ku ru / zhes pas brdungs la /
translated: Oṃ vajra kiṭi kiṭi, break all bonds, make them fall away.

original: de la btags pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim rdo rje phreng ba'i thig gdab la /
analyzed: de la btags pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim rdo rje phreng ba'i thig gdab la /
translated: With the thread that is tied to that [vajra], one should lay the thread of the vajra garland around the outer perimeter of the inner maṇḍala.

original: des dkyil 'khor lnga ka ba brgyad dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: des dkyil 'khor lnga ka ba brgyad dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: By that, the five maṇḍalas should be endowed with eight pillars.

original: srad bu de nyid kyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig rdo rje la sogs pa'i phreng ba gsum gyi thig dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / gling bzhi dang / dkyil 'khor drug dang / de dag gi bar gyi phreng ba'i thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: srad bu de nyid kyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig rdo rje la sogs pa'i phreng ba gsum gyi thig dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / gling bzhi dang / dkyil 'khor drug dang / de dag gi bar gyi phreng ba'i thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: With that very thread, one should lay the thread of the three garlands of vajras and so forth of the outer maṇḍala, the surrounding wall, the great surrounding wall, the four continents, the six maṇḍalas, and the garland threads between them.

original: de'i rjes la 'khor lo'i thig ni tshangs pa'i thig las mtshon te shar la sogs par btab par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la 'khor lo'i thig ni tshangs pa'i thig las mtshon te shar la sogs par btab par bya ste /
translated: After that, the wheel thread should be marked from the Brahmā thread and placed in the east and so forth.

original: thig gi cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o /
analyzed: thig gi cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o /
translated: That is the concise thread ritual.

original: // / de nas gal te dkyil 'khor la bdag la 'ga' zhig bgegs byed par sems shing rlung dang char la sogs pa gtod bar byed pas na /
analyzed: // / de nas gal te dkyil 'khor la bdag la 'ga' zhig bgegs byed par sems shing rlung dang char la sogs pa gtod bar byed pas na /
translated: Then, if someone thinks of creating an obstacle for the maṇḍala and sends wind, rain, and so on,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor du grog mkhar gyi sa la lha la sogs pa bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor du grog mkhar gyi sa la lha la sogs pa bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas la /
translated: one should make a likeness of the obstacle-maker, such as a god, out of an anthill in the maṇḍala’s light.

original: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rlung bcad pa dang / char bzlog pa la sogs pa cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
analyzed: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rlung bcad pa dang / char bzlog pa la sogs pa cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
translated: One should perform the rite of blocking the wind and averting the rain, and so on, according to the rite of Ārya Acalā.

original: dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
translated: One should draw the maṇḍala.

original: dang po rin po che la sogs pa'i snod du /
analyzed: dang po rin po che la sogs pa'i snod du /
translated: First, in a vessel of jewels, and so on,

original: tshon dkar po la sogs pa rang gi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste /
analyzed: tshon dkar po la sogs pa rang gi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste /
translated: one should place the white powder, and so on, in one’s four directions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las sprul pa'i gzugs ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa sprul par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las sprul pa'i gzugs ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa sprul par bya ste /
translated: One should emanate the emanations of the purification of all lower realms, and so on, from the heart of all tathāgatas.

original: de la ngan song sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcas la /
analyzed: de la ngan song sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcas la /
translated: Regarding that, one should perform the consecration of the colors with the samadhi of purifying the lower realms, making the mudra of the single-pointed vajra.

original: aom badzra mukti bh'a ba ti h'um /🔽zhes bzhag ste /
analyzed: aom badzra mukti bh'a ba ti h'um / zhes bzhag ste /
translated: Om vajra mukti bhavati hum.

original: dkar po mu tig tu byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: dkar po mu tig tu byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: One should place that and consecrate the white as a pearl.

original: de bzhin du rin po che tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis rin po che 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rin po che tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis rin po che 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Likewise, one should perform the consecration of the colors with the samadhi of the jewel crest, binding the mudra of the blazing jewel.

original: aom ratna su barna bh'a ba ti h'um /
analyzed: aom ratna su barna bh'a ba ti h'um /
translated: Om ratna subarna bhavati hum.

original: zhes bya bas tshon ser po gser du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas tshon ser po gser du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: One should consecrate the yellow color as gold.

original: sh'akya thub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis padma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: sh'akya thub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis padma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: One should perform the consecration of the colors with the samadhi of Shakyamuni, binding the mudra of the lotus.

original: @145b aom mu ne padma r'a ga bh'a ba ti dhi /
analyzed: @145b aom mu ne padma r'a ga bh'a ba ti dhi /
translated: Om munaye padmaraga bhavati dhi.

original: zhes bya bas tshon dmar po padma r'a gar byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas tshon dmar po padma r'a gar byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: One should consecrate the red color as a ruby.

original: me tog chen po rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: me tog chen po rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: One should perform the consecration of the colors with the samadhi of the blossoming of the great flower, binding the mudra of the sword.

original: aom karma marga ta bh'a ba ni aa /
analyzed: aom karma marga ta bh'a ba ni aa /
translated: Om karma margadha bhavati ah.

original: zhes bya bas tshon ljang gu mar gad du yin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas tshon ljang gu mar gad du yin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should consecrate the green color as the essence of laughter.🔽By the samadhi of Vairochana, one should form the five-pronged vajra mudra

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: and recite:

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ba ti h'um /🔽zhes bya bas tshon sngon po rdo rje'am /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ba ti h'um / zhes bya bas tshon sngon po rdo rje'am /
translated: Om, all tathagatas, vajra speech, hum.

original: mu men du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: mu men du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should consecrate the blue color as the essence of vajra or lapis lazuli.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la gnas pa'i phur bu h'um bzhis bton la khung bu tshon sna lngas bkang ste /

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i ni sa la sogs pa la bya ste /

analyzed: mig g-yas dang g-yon du yi ge dhi dang / aa nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad dam rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas pas rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor pa'am de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyas tshon dkar po blangs la

original: / aom badzra r'a ga sa ma ye h'um /

analyzed: dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas song ste /

analyzed: padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i gdan @146a * //

analyzed: byang shar du ni gar mkhan ma dang dri chab ma dgod par bya'o //

original: zhes bya'o // tshangs pa la ni brahma n'a ye h'um /🔽zhes bya'o // brgya byin la ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // tshangs pa la ni brahma n'a ye h'um / zhes bya'o // brgya byin la ni /
translated: For Brahmā, it is Brahmaṇāye hūṃ.

original: aom sha kre sva /
analyzed: aom sha kre sva /
translated: For Śakra, it is Oṃ śakra svā.

original: zhes bya'o // khyab 'jug la ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // khyab 'jug la ni /
translated: Thus it is said.🔽For Vishnu, it is:

original: aom bishnu bi shuddha /
analyzed: aom bishnu bi shuddha /
translated: Om Vishnushuddha.

original: zhes bya'o // dbang phyug chen po la ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // dbang phyug chen po la ni /
translated: For Maheshavara, it is:

original: aom pa shu ba ti n'i la kanth'a /
analyzed: aom pa shu ba ti n'i la kanth'a /
translated: Om Pashupati nilah kantha.

original: zhes bya'o // lha'i gnas su ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // lha'i gnas su ni /
translated: For the gods, it is:

original: aom de ba ye sarba sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom de ba ye sarba sv'a h'a /
translated: Om deva ye sarva svaha.

original: zhes bya'o // mi rnams la ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // mi rnams la ni /
translated: For humans, it is:

original: aom na ra y'a na /
analyzed: aom na ra y'a na /
translated: Om narayana.

original: zhes bya'o // lha ma yin rnams la ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // lha ma yin rnams la ni /
translated: For the asuras, it is:

original: aom aa su r'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa su r'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Om asuraya svaha.

original: zhes bya'o // dud 'gro'i gnas su ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // dud 'gro'i gnas su ni /
translated: For the animal realm, it is:

original: aom tir++ya k'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽zhes @149a * //
analyzed: aom tir++ya k'a ya sv'a h'a / zhes @149a * //
translated: Om tirya kayasvaha.

original: bya'o // yi dags rnams la ni /
analyzed: bya'o // yi dags rnams la ni /
translated: For the hungry ghosts, it is:

original: aom pre t'a ya sarba sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom pre t'a ya sarba sv'a h'a /
translated: Om pretaya sarva svaha.

original: zhes bya'o // dmyal ba rnams la ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // dmyal ba rnams la ni /
translated: For the hells, it is:

original: aom sarba na ra ke sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarba na ra ke sv'a h'a /
translated: Om sarvanarake svaha.

original: zhes bya ba rnams kyis bar snang las dkyil 'khor du dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba rnams kyis bar snang las dkyil 'khor du dbab par bya'o //
translated: All of those are to be visualized in the sky in the maṇḍala.

original: de dag thams cad kyang yang na thig le'am yi ge'i 'bru rnams dgod par bya ba'am /
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang yang na thig le'am yi ge'i 'bru rnams dgod par bya ba'am /
translated: All of those are also to be visualized as bindus or seed syllables.

original: padma nyid dgod par bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: padma nyid dgod par bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ste /
translated: The Blessed One has taught the lotus itself to be the array.

original: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i chog mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i chog mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: This is the concise ritual for drawing the maṇḍala.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bkod nas /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bkod nas /
translated: Having thus well arranged the maṇḍala,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du stegs bu sor bcu gnyis pas 'khor bar byas la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du stegs bu sor bcu gnyis pas 'khor bar byas la /
translated: outside the maṇḍala, one should make a platform twelve fingerbreadths in size.

original: dris nye bar byugs te /
analyzed: dris nye bar byugs te /
translated: Having anointed it with water,

original: me tog bkram pa'i steng du /
analyzed: me tog bkram pa'i steng du /
translated: on top of a spread of flowers,

original: mar me dang / bshos dang / aa ga ru la sogs pa'i bdug pa'i khang pa dang / bum pa dang / ga pur la sogs pa'i dri dang / gur kum la sogs pa'i btung ba dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa'i bca' ba dang /
analyzed: mar me dang / bshos dang / aa ga ru la sogs pa'i bdug pa'i khang pa dang / bum pa dang / ga pur la sogs pa'i dri dang / gur kum la sogs pa'i btung ba dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa'i bca' ba dang /
translated: one should place lamps, food, a house for incense such as agarwood, a vase, scents such as camphor, drinks such as saffron, edibles such as fruit,

original: mda' dang / me long dang / ral gri dang / me tog phreng ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / bla re dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rma bya la sogs pa bya'i gzugs la sogs pa brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bcu las mi nyung bar 'khor bar byas nas /🔽dgongs ka'i dus su rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la bdag nyid khrus dang dris byugs la /
analyzed: mda' dang / me long dang / ral gri dang / me tog phreng ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / bla re dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rma bya la sogs pa bya'i gzugs la sogs pa brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bcu las mi nyung bar 'khor bar byas nas / dgongs ka'i dus su rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la bdag nyid khrus dang dris byugs la /
translated: arrows, mirrors, swords, flower garlands, clothes, ornaments, canopies, parasols, victory banners, flags, peacocks, and so forth, the forms of birds, and so forth, in a circle of at least one hundred and eight, twenty-one, or ten.

original: stod g-yogs dang / smad g-yogs dang / dbu rgyan dang / dar dbyangs dang / autpa la dang / gdu bu dang / sor gdub dang / do shal dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la /
analyzed: stod g-yogs dang / smad g-yogs dang / dbu rgyan dang / dar dbyangs dang / autpa la dang / gdu bu dang / sor gdub dang / do shal dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la /
translated: At the time of the evening, having performed ablutions and anointed oneself with perfume, having put on the upper garment, the lower garment, the diadem, the silk scarves, the utpala flower, the bracelets, the anklets, the necklace, the armlet, and all the ornaments, one should enter, having formed the samaya mudra of Vajradhara.

original: 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: 'jug par bya ste /
translated: One should also recite:

original: aom badzra satva h'um /🔽zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra satva h'um /🔽zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Oṃ vajrasattva hūṃ.

original: de'i rjes la rdo rje slob dpon gyis mnyam par gzhag pas dbus su 'dug la me tog phreng ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phul te /🔽gar byas nas blangs te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la rdo rje slob dpon gyis mnyam par gzhag pas dbus su 'dug la me tog phreng ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phul te / gar byas nas blangs te /
translated: Then, the vajra master, equipoised, should sit in the center and offer the flower garland to the Blessed One Vairocana.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Having danced, he should take it up, and, with the yoga of Vajrahūṃkāra, he should bind it to his head.

original: de nas yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar bya ste /🔽aom badzra dha ra audgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
analyzed: de nas yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar bya ste / aom badzra dha ra audgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
translated: Then, with the mind, he should open the four doors,

original: zhes brjod la /
analyzed: zhes brjod la /
translated: saying, “Oṃ vajra-dhara udghāṭaya samaya praveśaya hūṃ.”

original: rdo rje mdzub mo legs par sbyar la bkan te mthe chung gnyis mdud la mthe bong khu tshur du byas pas khros nas dbye bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mdzub mo legs par sbyar la bkan te mthe chung gnyis mdud la mthe bong khu tshur du byas pas khros nas dbye bar bya'o //
translated: Having joined the vajra index fingers well, he should open them with the two little fingers crossed and the thumbs in a fist, wrathfully.

original: de'i 'og tu stong pa nyid kyi mthar rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i @149b chus ;🔽aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu stong pa nyid kyi mthar rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i @149b chus ; aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
translated: Then, at the end of emptiness, with the water enchanted with Vajrayakṣa,

original: zhes bya bas rdzas thams cad la bsang bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas rdzas thams cad la bsang bar bya'o //
translated: he should sprinkle all the substances with “Oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ.”

original: de'i 'og tu sbyor ba dang pho dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu sbyor ba dang pho dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum rdzogs par byas la /
translated: Then, one should complete the three aspects of meditative stabilization: the yoga, the hero, and the supreme royal maṇḍala, and the supreme royal activities.

original: mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis rgyas btab la rang nyid dbang la sogs pa thams cad rdzogs par bya ste /
analyzed: mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis rgyas btab la rang nyid dbang la sogs pa thams cad rdzogs par bya ste /
translated: Having sealed all the hosts of offerings, one should perfect all the empowerments, and so forth, for oneself.

original: de la bdag nyid chen po'i lha dang / snying rjes bskyed pa'i lha'i phyag rgya ni gtor ma'i skabs su shes par bya'o //🔽bla mar gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: de la bdag nyid chen po'i lha dang / snying rjes bskyed pa'i lha'i phyag rgya ni gtor ma'i skabs su shes par bya'o // bla mar gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag rgya ni /
translated: The mudrā of the deity of great identity and the mudrā of the deity generated by compassion should be known from the section on the bali offering.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽lag pa g-yon pa chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis lhung bzed 'dzin cing /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / lag pa g-yon pa chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis lhung bzed 'dzin cing /
translated: The mudrā of the guru deity is as follows:🔽The left hand holds the alms bowl in the manner of holding the Dharma robe,

original: g-yas pa chos 'chad pa'i tshul du byas pa ni /
analyzed: g-yas pa chos 'chad pa'i tshul du byas pa ni /
translated: and the right hand is in the gesture of teaching the Dharma.

original: 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the pledge seal of all ārya śrāvakas.

original: de nyid las thal mo snying gar sbyar ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las thal mo snying gar sbyar ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that very [mudra], the añjali at the heart is the action seal.

original: phyag rgya chen po ni las kyi phyag rgya nyid las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni las kyi phyag rgya nyid las shes par bya'o //
translated: The great seal is to be known from the action seal itself.

original: lag pa gnyis ting nge 'dzin du lte bar bsnol ba ni rang rgyal ba rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis ting nge 'dzin du lte bar bsnol ba ni rang rgyal ba rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The two hands crossed at the navel in meditative equipoise is the pledge seal of the Solitary Sages.

original: de nyid las lag pa g-yas pa chos 'chad du byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las lag pa g-yas pa chos 'chad du byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that very [mudra], the right hand in the teaching gesture is the action seal.

original: phyag rgya chen po ni de bzhin nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni de bzhin nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The great seal is to be cultivated as suchness.

original: rdo rje bcings pas mdzub mo gnyis dam du mthud la mthe bong dang / gung mo rdo rje dpral bar gzhag pa ni stobs po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bcings pas mdzub mo gnyis dam du mthud la mthe bong dang / gung mo rdo rje dpral bar gzhag pa ni stobs po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: With the vajra bond, the two index fingers tightly bound, the thumbs and middle fingers touch at the forehead: this is the pledge seal of Mahābala.

original: lag pa gnyis rnga yab dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis rnga yab dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The two hands holding a fly whisk and a noose is the action seal.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa la las kyi lcags kyu dang zhags par bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa la las kyi lcags kyu dang zhags par bya ba ni /
translated: The vajra bond with the action hook and noose is

original: mi g-yo ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: the pledge seal of Acala.

original: de nyid g-yas dang g-yon du phral nas gzung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //🔽rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis gzhibs la srin lag g-yon pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mos mnan /
analyzed: de nyid g-yas dang g-yon du phral nas gzung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o // rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis gzhibs la srin lag g-yon pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mos mnan /
translated: The action seal is separating those two and holding them.🔽From the vajra bond, the two middle fingers are placed together, and the left ring finger is pressed by the right forefinger.

original: g-yon pa'i mdzub mos g-yas pa'i srin lag bzung la zlum por byas te /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i mdzub mos g-yas pa'i srin lag bzung la zlum por byas te /
translated: The left forefinger holds the right ring finger, and they are made into a circle.

original: mthe bong gnyis mngon par phyogs bar byas te kha'i tshul du gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis mngon par phyogs bar byas te kha'i tshul du gzhag pa ni /
translated: The two thumbs are turned toward each other and placed at the mouth.

original: gshin rje mthar byed kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gshin rje mthar byed kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the pledge seal of Yamantaka.

original: de nyid dbyug pa 'phyar ba'i tshul byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid dbyug pa 'phyar ba'i tshul byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The action seal is making a gesture of brandishing a club.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis la mthe chung lu gu rgyud ltar mthud nas mdzub mo gshibs te bsgreng nas bslangs te dpral bar gzhag pa ni /🔽rta mchog gi dam @150a * //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis la mthe chung lu gu rgyud ltar mthud nas mdzub mo gshibs te bsgreng nas bslangs te dpral bar gzhag pa ni / rta mchog gi dam @150a * //
translated: The two vajra fists are linked at the small fingers like a chain, and the forefingers are extended and raised, placed on the forehead.

original: tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the pledge seal of Hayagriva.

original: lag pa gnyis kha 'gram gnyis su phyar ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis kha 'gram gnyis su phyar ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The action seal is raising the two hands to the sides of the mouth.

original: mthe bong gnyis mthe chung gi sen mo mnan nas dpung mgo'i drung du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du byas te bzhag pa ni /
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis mthe chung gi sen mo mnan nas dpung mgo'i drung du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du byas te bzhag pa ni /
translated: Pressing the fingernails of the two thumbs against the fingernails of the two little fingers, one should place them near the shoulders in the manner of binding a vajra.

original: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the pledge seal of Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: thal mo gnyis bsnol nas brang du gzung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: thal mo gnyis bsnol nas brang du gzung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The ritual action seal is to hold the two palms together at the chest.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo g-yas pa dbyug pa ltar bsgreng pa ni dbyug pa sngon po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo g-yas pa dbyug pa ltar bsgreng pa ni dbyug pa sngon po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: From the vajra binding, the right forefinger is raised like a club. This is the pledge seal of Nīladaṇḍa.

original: lag pa g-yon pa sdigs mdzub phyar la g-yas pa dbyug pa phyar ba ltar byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa sdigs mdzub phyar la g-yas pa dbyug pa phyar ba ltar byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The ritual action seal is to raise the left hand in the threatening gesture and the right hand as if holding a club.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis phye ba'i tshul du bkug pa ni gzhan las rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis phye ba'i tshul du bkug pa ni gzhan las rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: From the vajra binding, the two forefingers are bent in the manner of opening. This is the pledge seal of Aparājita.

original: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub snying gar bzung la g-yas pa thal sbyar gyi tshul du byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub snying gar bzung la g-yas pa thal sbyar gyi tshul du byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The ritual action seal is to hold the left hand in the threatening gesture at the heart and the right hand in the manner of holding the palms together.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las sor mo rnams 'bar bar byas pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las sor mo rnams 'bar bar byas pa ni /
translated: The vajra fist is formed by the fingers blazing.🔽

original: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The gesture of the three worlds’ total victory is formed from the vajra-binding gesture by blazing the fingers.

original: mthe chung lu gu rgyud du byas la sdigs mdzub gnyis snying gar gzung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mthe chung lu gu rgyud du byas la sdigs mdzub gnyis snying gar gzung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The action seal is formed by making a chain with the little fingers and holding the two threatening forefingers at the heart.

original: phyag rgya chen po ni de dag gis skur bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni de dag gis skur bsgom pa'o //
translated: The great seal is meditating on the body with those.

original: de dag thams cad kyi lce la yi ge hr'i: las padma /
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyi lce la yi ge hr'i: las padma /
translated: For all of them, on the tongue is a lotus from hriḥ.

original: de'i steng du a'a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje /
analyzed: de'i steng du a'a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje /
translated: On that is an āḥ, from which arises a moon maṇḍala. On that is a hūṃ, from which arises a vajra.

original: de'i dbus su hr'i: las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po bsams la /
analyzed: de'i dbus su hr'i: las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po bsams la /
translated: In the center of that is a hriḥ, from which arises Bhagavat Amitābha, red in color.

original: sngags kyi yi ge thams cad brjod pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi yi ge thams cad brjod pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Reciting all the mantra syllables is the dharma seal.

original: de la sngags kyi snying po ni /
analyzed: de la sngags kyi snying po ni /
translated: The essence of the mantra is:

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la ni gong du smos pa'i snying po yin la /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la ni gong du smos pa'i snying po yin la /
translated: For śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, the essence is as mentioned above.

original: khro bo rnams kyi ni /
analyzed: khro bo rnams kyi ni /
translated: For the wrathful ones, it is:

original: aom badzra kro dha ma h'a ba la au tsushma kro dha h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha ma h'a ba la au tsushma kro dha h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodha mahābala uṣṇīṣa-krodha hūṃ.

original: aom a'arya aa tsa la h'um /
analyzed: aom a'arya aa tsa la h'um /
translated: Oṃ ārya-acala hūṃ.

original: aom ya m'anta ka h'um /
analyzed: aom ya m'anta ka h'um /
translated: Oṃ yamāntaka hūṃ.

original: aom ha ya gr'i pa h'um /🔽aom aa mri ta kunda li h'um /
analyzed: aom ha ya gr'i pa h'um / aom aa mri ta kunda li h'um /
translated: Oṃ hayagrīva hūṃ.🔽Oṃ amṛtakuṇḍali hūṃ.

original: aom n'i la danda h'um /
analyzed: aom n'i la danda h'um /
translated: Oṃ nīladaṇḍa hūṃ.

original: aom aa par dzi ta h'um /
analyzed: aom aa par dzi ta h'um /
translated: Oṃ aparājita hūṃ.

original: aom tree lo kya bi dz'a ya h'um /

analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs pas gtang bar bya'o //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas la /

analyzed: de dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o //

analyzed: 'jug pa'i tshe slob mas rdo rje'i glu 'di blang bar bya'o //

original: pa ra su kotta ma sa dve ma h'a s'u tra siddhi da hi ya mi /
analyzed: pa ra su kotta ma sa dve ma h'a s'u tra siddhi da hi ya mi /

analyzed: zhes byas nas rol cing dga' pa dang / @152b bcas pas slob dpon la phyag bya'o //

analyzed: aom badzra pra be dza: h'um bam ho:/

analyzed: zhes bya ba bcug la dri chu la /

analyzed: aom badzrod ka zhes pa'i snying po bzlas /

original: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //

analyzed: dam tshig bsrungs na grub 'gyur ba'i //

analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig / ces brjod la blud par bya'o //
translated: drink this vajra nectar water,🔽and it will bring you accomplishment.

original: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor snying ga la sogs pa gnas gsum du rdo rje sems ma la sogs par dri'i thig les byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor snying ga la sogs pa gnas gsum du rdo rje sems ma la sogs par dri'i thig les byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Then, at the eastern door, consecrate the three places—heart, and so on—with drops of saffron water as Vajrasattva, and so on.

original: 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad brjod par bya'o //

analyzed: ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur na /

analyzed: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /

original: the tshom mi bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: the tshom mi bya ba nyid do //

original: de nas de'i spyi bor rdo rje bzhag la /
analyzed: de nas de'i spyi bor rdo rje bzhag la /

original: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: and say this:

analyzed: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig go //

original: rdo rje yin te 'ga' zhig la //
analyzed: rdo rje yin te 'ga' zhig la //

original: tshul 'di smras na khyod kyi ni //
analyzed: tshul 'di smras na khyod kyi ni //

analyzed: spyi bo rab tu 'gas par 'gyur //

original: aom rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyang ni //
analyzed: aom rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyang ni //

analyzed: deng 'dir khyod kyi snying la gnas //

original: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
analyzed: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //

analyzed: de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs //

original: zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod par bya'o //

original: de nas bka' bsgo bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas bka' bsgo bar bya ste /

analyzed: deng nas brtsams nas khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin pas na /

analyzed: ngas 'di gyis shig ces bsgo ba rnams khyod kyis bya dgos so //
translated: Whatever I command you to do, you must do it.🔽Do not despise me.

translated: If you do not give up fear, you will die and fall into hell.”🔽Then, by saying “A,” imagine that you are white Vajrasattva.

analyzed: de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar yi ge aa rdo @153a * //
translated: After that, in your heart, the letter A is a white five-pronged vajra.

original: rje'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: rje'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: One should be endowed with the garland of the Lord's light rays.

original: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan par byas la /
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan par byas la /

original: sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang gi snying ga dang / slob ma'i snying ga dbye bar bya'o //
analyzed: sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang gi snying ga dang / slob ma'i snying ga dbye bar bya'o //

analyzed: de nas rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i rdo rje las aa zhes bya ba phyung la /

original: slob ma'i snying gar gnas pa'i //🔽rdo rje'i dbus su zlos bcug la /
analyzed: slob ma'i snying gar gnas pa'i // rdo rje'i dbus su zlos bcug la /

original: lus thams cad kun du gang bar gyur bar bsams la /
analyzed: lus thams cad kun du gang bar gyur bar bsams la /

original: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Then the vajra master quickly forms the Vajradhara mudra

original: de'i snying gar bzhag la /
analyzed: de'i snying gar bzhag la /
translated: and places it on the disciple's heart.

original: 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
analyzed: 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
translated: He should say this:

original: aom 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
analyzed: aom 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
translated: Om, this is the vajra commitment,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //

original: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di //

original: de ring nyid du dbab par shog / aom badzra satva a'a be sha aa:/
analyzed: de ring nyid du dbab par shog / aom badzra satva a'a be sha aa:/
translated: Om vajrasattva avah.

original: zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod na 'bab bar 'gyur ro//
analyzed: zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod na 'bab bar 'gyur ro//
translated: If one recites this a hundred times, it will descend.🔽In the same way, do it for all four families.

original: de bzhin du rigs bzhi ka la bya ste babs nas de'i lce la rdo rje bsams la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rigs bzhi ka la bya ste babs nas de'i lce la rdo rje bsams la /
translated: After it has descended, imagine a vajra on the disciple's tongue,

original: bhya hi badzra zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: bhya hi badzra zhes brjod par bya ste /

original: thams cad smras par 'gyur ro //

original: kun dang 'dra mnyam rtag par khyod 'gyur te //
analyzed: kun dang 'dra mnyam rtag par khyod 'gyur te //
translated: The bliss of migrators is small, but you will be equal to all buddhas.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
translated: This is the abode of all buddhas,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
translated: dwelling in the hand of Vajrasattva.

original: khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya //
analyzed: khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya //
translated: You should always hold it.

original: phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan //
translated: Vajrapani, be firm in your observances.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra satva sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam dha ra y'a mi badzra satva /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra satva sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam dha ra y'a mi badzra satva /
translated: Om, all the tathagatas' vajra being, I am firm in my vow.

original: hi hi hi hi h'um /
analyzed: hi hi hi hi h'um /
translated: Hi hi hi hi hum.

original: zhes bya la rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin du gzhug go //
analyzed: zhes bya la rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin du gzhug go //
translated: With this, one should make him hold the vajra and observe the vow.
